title: Pospischil Realty Group
address: 1638 W 1st Ave, Vancouver, BC V6G 1J1, Canada

reviews.name: Ken and Louise McG
reviews.text:
Thanks to Marty and Adam's very well thought out marketing plan we were able to sell our condo quickly and at the best possible selling price.  Their process is well adapted to Covid protocols - keeping everyone safe.
Will highly recommend the Pospischil Team to anyone planning on selling their home.

reviews.name: M Stat
reviews.text: I had the pleasure of working with Adam when buying my first condo. He was always very responsive, patient with my many questions, and overall extremely professional. He was very knowledgeable about the market and happily went over as much market data as I wanted, which helped me feel more informed when property hunting. There were several occasions when I told him I was interested in a unit and he followed up by forwarding me very useful information on local developments in planning for that area. He was also very cool headed when helping me negotiate with sellers when the bidding got intensive, and was very diligent in the process even at odd hours of the day. The firm's website is also very usable, and has a very wide inventory. Overall the service is excellent and I will be recommending the Pospischil Realty Group to my friends and family in Vancouver!

reviews.name: Jordan Messer
reviews.text:
Charley helped me find a place to buy in downtown Vancouver. Charley was extremely response and helpful setting up viewings quickly after discussing with him about properties we were interested in.

Throughout the whole process Charley explained what steps needed to be taken and the options I had available for each step. He answered all the questions I had in a quick and efficient manner. He made the difficult process of purchasing a place easy.

The best quality Charley has is the work effort he puts into helping you secure the place you want. Charley helped work with me for hours until midnight on a Sunday in order to help secure the condo I wanted.

The service provided was above and beyond anything I expected and I am extremely glad to have worked with Charley.

reviews.name: Bangshoong
reviews.text: Charley Lee was very professional and made him self available to accommodate my  schedule. He seemed to have a lot of local knowledge, understood what I needed, and stayed within my budget. When we had a  appointment he was always on time and we never had to wait very long for a response to a text  or phone call. If he didn’t know an answer to a question we had, he would look into it and get back to me!.It was nice to have peace of mind that everything was being handled as it should!

reviews.name: Krisztina Boultbee
reviews.text:
This was our second time working with Marty and his team. The first time was when he helped us look for a house 20 years ago. He found us the home where we raised our family.  Now the kids are grown up, and its time to downsize.  Marty helped sell the house in 7 days and was able to get us multiple offers to choose from. I love our home but it’s time to find another one, more suitable for just the two of us. We, for sure will ask Marty again to help us.
Thank you Marty and Team! You worked really hard!

reviews.name: Amy Lee
reviews.text: I would like to thank Pospischil Realty Group for helping me buy my first home! We are so grateful that we had Charley as our realtor. Charley is knowledgeable, efficient, and friendly. He was available day and night and was very quick to answer all our questions and to book new showings. I recommended Charley to my friend and she found her dream home just two days after she met Charley. I would definitely work with Posphischil Realty Group again in the future. Thank you for your hard work and dedication in finding a perfect first home for us, Charley!

reviews.name: Mija Jang
reviews.text:
This is our first time for buying a new house, me and my husband. We did not have knowledge at all about real estate. But then, everything got just changed since we met Charley from Pospischil Realty Group. He invited us to the office and gave us the professional presentation with plenty of information about real estate. That moment brought up the belief that we could ship on with him about our journey of getting a dream home. During this all the journey, he was super friendly, responsive, and professional all the time. And, when we were informed as a new house owner, we felt Charley was truly happy from the bottom of his heart as well. Thank you so much Charley. We can not describe with words how much we appreciate to you. Definitely, we will be so happy to have Charley again for the house plan in our further future. Thanks again.
All the best :)

reviews.name: aaron price
reviews.text: Pospischil Realty Group was personally recommended by friends and they did a fantastic job selling our home. Especially invaluable during this complex time of Covid was the professionalism and focus of their entire team offering timely and meticulous service at every stage. As first time sellers we really appreciated the transparency and integrity shown by Marty and Adam as they guided us through the entire process towards a phenomenal sale. Would highly recommend to family, friends and anyone looking for a first rate realty service.

reviews.name: Keegan Woodcock
reviews.text: We recently purchased a home through Adam as our realtor. We are first time buyers and had a ton of questions. Adam was very informative, patient, and calm through every step. We felt safe that he had our best interests at heart and never felt pressured into anything. We have managed to get the home of our dreams. Pospischil Realty group is the way to go!!

reviews.name: Geoff Dittrich
reviews.text:
The Pospischil team is phenomenal.
They are trustworthy, super professional, and know Vancouver deeply. They took such great care in the sale of our home, staged it beautifully, activated an enormous amount of effective marketing, ran a huge amount of people through our place, and blew us away with the offers they brought in. They're excellent negotiators and advocates, take the time to know what matters to us, and put more energy into our sale than I even understand.
After all that, they patiently helped us to buy our new home! They helped us see the things we didn't know to look for, and gave us great confidence throughout the entire experience.
If you need to buy or sell real estate, THIS is who you need to work with.

reviews.name: Brendan L
reviews.text: I had an amazing experience with Adam and the Pospischil Realty Group Team. After seeing them sell and buy 4 of my family member’s homes over the past 5 years, they were the first people to pop into my mind when I wanted to buy my very first home. Adam was extremely helpful and professional throughout the entire home buying journey. As a first time home buyer, he took the time to simplify many of the terms and steps to make it easier for me to understand. His knowledge and experience helped me find a fantastic place within my price range. Highly recommend you give them a shout if you’re looking to buy!

reviews.name: Devon Carbol
reviews.text: Wow!  8 days on the market and sold!   At our first meeting Marty and Adam explained the Pospischil system for selling our home and then we sat back and watched them carry it out.  Their well executed plan and professional negotiation generated multiple offers and a sale price $332,00 above asking, all in only 8 days on the market!  Selling?  They are your team.

reviews.name: Seize the day
reviews.text: Charley helped us buy a new house. As a first time home buyer I wouldn't have wanted to work with anyone else. He worked hard to make sure we were buying the best possible place for us. We looked many houses, he was always thorough, patient and honest. We are so incredibly happy in our new home and would highly recommend him. Thanks Charley ;)   - D Shin

reviews.name: Gregory Gzik
reviews.text:
Adam Pospischil was awesome.

He was very patient with us two first time home buyers as we had delays and hiccups throughout the process.

He also helped us out on numerous occasions by reaching out to the sellers realtor to ask for information, counter offers, and requests.He is absolutely relentless when it comes time to making an offer to get us the best deal possible.

I’m very thankful for his great work and am looking forward to working with him again on our next home / investment property.

reviews.name: DK Lee
reviews.text: I normally don't take my time to write reviews, but I think I have to this time to thank Pospischil Realty Group for helping me find my first home in Vancouver. I had the wonderful pleasure of working with Charley. He guided us from start to finish during the whole process with positivity, patience, and encouragement. He answered all our questions every step of the way and was on top of everything. I highly recommend Charley and Pospischil Realty Group to anyone who is looking for a place to buy

reviews.name: Tim Reid
reviews.text:
I used the Pospischil Realty Group to both buy a townhouse and sell my condo in Burnaby (Metrotown area). They provided consistently great advice throughout the process, helping me get in ahead of the crowd and avoid competition when buying.

When selling, they priced competitively while marketing aggressively and generated competition, resulting in a sale price well above asking within hours of taking offers.

I was extremely happy with the results on both sides and wouldn't hesitate to use them again for real estate in the Vancouver or Burnaby area, and would highly recommend them to anyone looking to make a move. Just make sure to follow their advice!

reviews.name: Joanne Oh
reviews.text:
My fiancé and I loved working with Charley.
We weren't very knowledgeable about real estate when we'd decided to buy our first condo. We were recommended to reach out to Charley, and during our first appointment with him, he was very passionate about educating us and seemed excited to help with finding our new home.
During the whole process, he was always available for us day and night and was so patient when answering hundreds of questions(even though some were "stupid" questions).
We've finally found a perfect condo with perfect timing, price and location, and we wouldn't have found it without him.
I will definitely recommend Charley to my family and friends in the future.

reviews.name: Kyeongjin Baek
reviews.text: This great group made a purchase of a really good town home located at a hot place for my family. They were always reliable and communicated quickly with me and seller’s Realtor for the best decision at any time and reviewed the documents thoroughly until very late at night for me. My wife and I are very satisfied with the group, especially Charley, and we strongly recommend it to our friends around us. If you are looking at this review, I recommend you to do business with this company right away.  Without a doubt, they will captivate you with their tremendous performance and satisfy your demanding needs.

reviews.name: Stephen Jamison
reviews.text: Adam was super helpful! My first purchase and he walked me through the whole process. I had a ton of questions/concerns and Adam was able to handle all of them. Highly recommended!

reviews.name: C G
reviews.text: I had the pleasure of working with Charley at Pospischil Realty Group. He is knowledgable, attentive, and reliable. He took the time to explain the steps and terms to me as a first time home buyer. Charley helped me find my home in my dream neighbourhood in less than a week! Thank you for helping me through this home buying journey. I highly recommend working with Charley and Pospischil Realty Group.

reviews.name: Linda Scratchley
reviews.text: Marty and the team at Pospischil Realty recently sold our mother's condo.  They have a multi-step marketing plan, and every step serves a very specific purpose in getting potentially interested parties through the door to view the property.  Part of this marketing included staging the property for us so that it could be shown off to its full potential.  The team at Pospischil Realty advertised the condo very aggressively, and their proactive marketing campaign ended up being extremely important.  In the week following the listing of the condo, 94 visitors came through yielding 14 interested parties and ultimately 3 competing offers.  The team negotiated over several hours resulting in the top offer being 80% above the list price and a record sale for the building in the prior period.  Trust Marty when he proposes a listing price.  We cannot imagine any other team doing any better for us in this property sale, and certainly not so quickly.

reviews.name: Gina Kim
reviews.text: I've had an amazing experience from Pospischil Realty Group when I purchased my first home. Their customized and responsive  work ethic enabled me to finalize my home buying process in a very effective manner. I especially thank Charley Lee as my buyer's representative for his professionalism. He provided me with knowlegeable explanations whenever I had questions and led me to the right direction strategically, for the most part, he took care of every single matter from the beginning to the end. I have absolutely satisfied with my current home ever since and I would definitely go with him for the next home purchasing or selling.

reviews.name: Zuanshu Fei
reviews.text:
I recently had the pleasure of working with Charley Lee when looking for my home. In short, top notch experience; this is what a realtor needs to be.

From day 1, Charley was extremely responsive and had great suggestions for homes to view based on what I was looking for. All throughout the negotiations and closing Charley was there quickly handling any issues that may have risen. If the time ever comes when I will be looking or selling any real estate, there isn't any question on who my Realtor will be!

reviews.name: Kathy S
reviews.text: The best real estate company I have ever dealt with. Very professional, experienced and helpful agents, Charley Lee. Highly recommend!

reviews.name: Benjamin Witt
reviews.text: Buying and selling during a pandemic did not seem like the ideal time to be making a big move in the market. However, there is a notable difference in experience when hiring professionals like Adam and Marty’s team.   I was amazed by Pospischil’s pivot to an online realty experience and excellent use of social media marketing and showcase tools. Following their strategy we were extremely pleased to find ourselves sold for over-asking and under budget on the next step up. Thanks again Adam!

reviews.name: Soo
reviews.text: Being a first home buyer there were many uncertainties, however I was able to find my perfect home through Charley's help. He knew exactly what I was looking for and in a matter of time, everything came into place like a miracle. Every steps into the purchase were taken care by Charley and was very satisfied with his timely service. I'll most likely seek his service again in the near future!

reviews.name: Chris Kim
reviews.text:
Charley was so helpful and responsive for every question/issue i had.
He was really deep into all the details and thorough on every perspective.
When you think of getting a realtor for your next home, he's the one you should try out!!! highly recommend him

reviews.name: Dale & Laurel
reviews.text: Very friendly, calm and professional. Always available to answer questions and patient with our thoughts and desires. Amazing strategic plan to market the sale of our home. Highly encourage anyone to reach out to Adam or Marty. You won't be disappointed.

reviews.name: Haley Shin
reviews.text: Charles has been very helpful to find a place for me as the first time home buyer ! I really appreciate his help and effort and would like to recommend him if anyone is looking for a place in Vancouver. Thank you very much, Charles ! :)

reviews.name: Steven Marino
reviews.text: Marty, Adam, and the Pospischil Realty team are a group of highly professional, personable, and trustworthy individuals. They take pride in working and living within their community, and have an incredible depth of knowledge in real estate. We have worked with them in a professional setting, as well as in a personal capacity, when we were purchasing a property in Vancouver. We would absolutely recommend Marty, Adam, and their team to anyone looking to buy or sell.

reviews.name: Karen C
reviews.text: Marty, Adam, and their team did a phenomenal job selling our house.  Their unique marketing system, and use of technology to reach prospective buyers were both impressive and effective. Every step of the process was well thought out and seamlessly executed, from preparing the home for sale, photography and floor plans, live stream broadcast, to showings and offers.  The whole team was professional, efficient, and dedicated to help us sell our property.  They generated 18 offers for us and strategically managed the offer process, resulting in a sale price that exceeded our expectations. We are truly impressed with Marty, Adam and their team - we could not think of one single thing that they could have done better in this whole process.  We would recommend the Pospischil Realty Group and would definitely use them again.

reviews.name: sarah weller
reviews.text: We have experienced the Pospischil Realty Group as both buyers and sellers and both times Marty, Adam and the team have been outstanding in providing the services we needed and supporting us along the journey. The team always goes above and beyond to help in every aspect of the sale process. At every stage we felt that we had the best people behind us to achieve what we had set out to. Their professionalism and passion for what they do shines through. I highly recommend them!

reviews.name: Sophia Burns
reviews.text: Marty and his entire team did an amazing job selling our home. The photos came out gorgeous and the staging was lovely. Marty made the whole process very seamless and took all the stress of home sales away. He was able to sell our home in less than a week. You are apart of the process in every way and you learn lots. Me and my family definitely recommend!

reviews.name: josava1
reviews.text: Adam and team are consummate professionals. He did a great job helping us find a home,  and he was incredibly patient with us first time buyers who had a million questions.  The whole team is very organized and knowledgeable,  and I highly recommend them for buying or selling your house.

reviews.name: Joel Erhart
reviews.text: Alleviated so much of the stress and work of finding and buying a new place.  They also sold my place for 8 days after it launched.  I received excellent professional advice every step of the way.

reviews.name: Hailey Choi
reviews.text: strongly recommend Charley Lee. He is professional and has full of knowledge about real estate area, which helps me to find right place on right time!

reviews.name: michael cullen
reviews.text: Pospischil Realty group understands how to sell real estate in these unusual times by making great use of virtual technology, having an understanding of the market, and having a well developed marketing system.   Our experience with Pospischil Realty was outstanding.  I have no reservations about recommending Pospischil Realty and would certainly use them again.

reviews.name: Do Youl Bae
reviews.text:
Charley is an AWESOME agent!

He always answered his phone and replied to emails within the hour. He had a really good understanding of the local markets, construction methods, and people!

During my time with him as a buyer, he taught me many things about real estate and his services were very professional. I trust Charley completely.

I would definitely like to work with him again the next time I sell/ buy any property.

reviews.name: Rob Wilson
reviews.text: Adam was extremely helpful, attentive, responsive and professional throughout the entire process of finding our new home.  We trusted his every move and he offered great advice.  Not only is he fantastic at his job, but he is a very kind and thoughtful person.  We are so thoroughly happy with the service that he provided us and would recommend Pospischil Realty Group to anyone.  Thank you Adam!

reviews.name: Bonita Boutilier
reviews.text:
Thanks to Marty and his team for the exceptional work they did in selling my condo.  His professionalism, knowledge, expertise and care to detail was demonstrated throughout the entire process.  I would highly recommend Marty.  He made me feel at ease by constantly communicating  with me during the process reassuring me that he had it under control, which he totally did...thanks again Marty, you absolutely
ROCK!!!!

reviews.name: dario casadei
reviews.text:
Marty and Adam are first class!

They were able to sell my Granville Island lease hold property in the middle of a pandemic for almost full asking price.

Friendly, Courteous and very tuned in to current market.

Contact Pospischil Realty Group for all your real estate needs.

Cheers guy,
Dario & Jojo

reviews.name: Sheri Tardi
reviews.text: Thanks to Marty, Adam and the team for all of their hard work! Not only did we receive multiple offers, we were able to get well over asking price and sold very quickly. Fabulous experience! We look forward to working with you all again!

reviews.name: Nick Zumpano
reviews.text:
From purchasing my condo 5 years ago to selling it and purchasing our dream home, Adam and Marty had been there every step of the way. Providing the knowledge and support along the way to make it as smooth as possible. Through every step: I bought my condo for the price I wanted, sold my condo for more than I wanted, and bought the house for the price I wanted. Their marketing strategies are quite impressive to witness, and their open houses draw lots of potential buyers. I'm looking forward to using them in the future.

Thank you Pospischil Realty!

reviews.name: Natalie M
reviews.text: Adam’s expertise was invaluable throughout the purchase of my first rental property. From navigating viewings in COVID-19 times to preparing and submitting an ultimately successful offer, the process went smoothly from beginning to end. Adam was readily available for any questions, big or small, and was always quick to respond to communication. Now that the purchase is complete, Adam continues to provide support on tenancy-related tasks and other miscellaneous matters. I look forward to working with Adam again in the future!

reviews.name: Jason Bolanos
reviews.text:
We primarily worked with Charley in buying our first home. From the very beginning, he carried himself professionally and walked us through the entire process in a step-by-step manner. We were able to find a place we liked, negotiated price in a timely manner, and went through the process smoothly, though a little too quickly than we hoped.

Every issue that was raised was addressed very thoroughly by Charley and special care was also taken into consideration despite the circumstances. We're thankful to have him by our side during the home-buying process.

reviews.name: Sean Mackenrot
reviews.text: Marty and Adam are phenomenal!! Very personable, professional and insightful. They put together a brilliant marketing strategy that resulted in 4 competitive offers allowing us to close on an agreement with no subjects and at a price well above our asking. From listing to sale was less than a week! They are not pushy at all and want the best for their clients. I strongly recommend them and suggest that you follow their advice and stick to the game plan - trust me, you will be very happy with the results.

reviews.name: Justin Tan
reviews.text: My wife and I are incredibly happy with the team at Pospischil Realty. Their approach was strategic, they used market data to explain their decisions, and they communicated with use throughout the entire sales process. Ultimately their team was able to generate 20 offers and we sold for well over asking. Thank you Pospischil Realty!

reviews.name: tere davila madrid
reviews.text: Charley is amazing, he is very well informed and always a call away. I highly recommend their services.

reviews.name: Jumana AR
reviews.text: We worked with Adam during our search for a house. Adam was very accommodating right from the start. He worked hard at making sure the offer was ready quickly once we found a place we liked and got the place for us. Thank you for helping us find our first home!

reviews.name: Christine Elder
reviews.text: We love Pospischil Realty for the great service and the excellent customer care that informed and supported us every step of the way!  Adam was knowledgeable, patient with us during our lengthy search, thorough in explaining processes and documents and always gave us prompt attention.  We highly recommend them for anyone buying, selling or both and know they will guide you through and help take some of the stress out of the the whole process.  Thank you so much!

reviews.name: Benjamin Isaacie
reviews.text: I like Marty's videos and how dedicated he is for his client satisfaction.

reviews.name: Tania Keefe
reviews.text: The Pospischil Realty Team is truly excellent: they bring the right mix of professionalism and personal attention to all their work!  Thanks very much Marty, Adam, and the whole team for all your great work throughout the process of selling our home.  We would not hesitate to recommend you to anyone looking to buy or sell property in Vancouver.

reviews.name: Tricia Doddington
reviews.text: This team is AMAZING!!  From our first meeting with Marty and Adam, we felt like we were the only listing that the team was working on - that we had 100% of their attention and focus.  During our first meeting Marty and Adam explained with complete transparency, honesty and clarity the listing, marketing and sales process.  The current market and what our expectations should look like.  Marty's WHOLE TEAM is exceptional, professional, and kind and was immediately at our side through the pre-sale staging, photos, measurements and everything that needed to be done.  The whole process took 20 days from our first meeting to the date of offer acceptance.  Our sale completed at almost 125% of our asking price, as a result of the exceptional extras and efforts that the team puts into full court marketing and ensuring that the public is aware of the sale. There is truly nothing more or different that I believe that this team could have provided throughout this process to improve upon our experience. Marty, Adam, Jennifer, Charley - THANK YOU!!! ~ 🙏🏻Vivienne, Tricia & Ian

reviews.name: Morgan Boyd
reviews.text:
Over the past few years I have purchased two properties in Vancouver with Adam as my realtor. After going through 3 different realtors that didn’t work out Adam was the one that finally stuck! I think that speaks for itself. Adam has been amazing, always working behind the scenes and going the extra mile to get things done. The whole Pospischil realty team has been nothing but professional and always give 100%. I cannot recommend them highly enough and I will definitely be using Pospischil realty if I purchase or sell another property in the city!

Edit: I have just sold an apartment with Adam and Marty and they were amazing!! They really pulled out all the stops to get me the best price possible and they did it all from list to sale in just over a week with ten offers! They were great at reassuring me and helping me navigate the whole process. They have a marketing strategy for a reason and they know what they're doing. Trust the process and you won't be disappointed! I cannot recommend Pospischil Realty Group highly enough. Thanks Adam and Marty!

reviews.name: Sid Rajeev
reviews.text: Marty promised us he would sell our place within 10 days. He not only sold it in 8 days, but also got us 10% higher than the list price. Hats off to Marty, Adam, and team for their clear cut strategy, marketing, negotiation, and perfect execution! This is our third transaction with Marty and Adam, and would recommend anyone, who is trying to buy or sell, to approach this amazing team.

reviews.name: Vivienne Doddington-Bridger
reviews.text: Marty, Adam, Charley and the whole group are by  far the first class realtors in Vancouver!  I have known Marty for a long time and he sold my condo well above asking price in only 13 days.  His marketing,, research, professionalism staging, and attention to detail were exceptional!!  Thank you Marty and you deserve your impressive growth and success!

reviews.name: Sara Sutton
reviews.text: From start to finish the Pospischil Realty Group was fantastic. From managing our tenant for open houses, to generating multiple offers, the teams care and attention were evident. The multiple offers resulted in an over asking sale that was quick, professional and stress free.

reviews.name: Cliona Ryan-Glennon
reviews.text: When you hear or read "Anything is Pospischil", believe it!  I am so happy with this creative, energetic and innovative team!

reviews.name: Rory Mullin
reviews.text:
It’s like Adam & Marty could read the future, and they let us in on the secret!
We followed their advice every step of the way, which got us 12 offers resulting in nearly $70,000 over asking.
Our condo was on the market for only 1 week, and using their targeted marketing strategy, we had over 200 visits to our open house events.
They made the entire process straightforward, and stress-free.

reviews.name: Zula Ganbold
reviews.text: Charley Lee was awesome!!! It was our first time putting an offer & buying a home. He guided us through the whole process with professionalism & full of knowledge. The whole process went as smooth as we can imagine.

reviews.name: Ross Coleman
reviews.text: We worked with Charley and Marty to find our new condo, they were great!  Very helpfully when we where looking, and answered all our questions quickly.  They took care of everything, and when we made an offer we knew we were in good hands. They also have a great network of quality professionals who helped along the way.

reviews.name: Elizabeth St Jacques
reviews.text: Marty, Adam, Creenagh and Jennifer provided us with an exceptional experience complete with home preparation support, beautiful marketing materials, a livestream open house & virtual tours that resulted in 19 offers. We couldn’t be more pleased and would highly recommend the Pospischil Realty Group.

reviews.name: Margery Hart
reviews.text: Marty and his team have helped me buy and sell on two occasions over the last 15 years and I wouldn't consider going with anyone else. A team of professionals all the way through the real estate process. A sure winner marketing strategy, on point knowledge of the market, coupled with professional and supportive guidance gave me the confidence I needed throughout the recent sale of my one bedroom condo. One week, and three open houses brought close to 400 potential buyers through my door. My home was listed for $498,000 and Marty and Adam generated 23 offers with their marketing plan and it sold for $580,000. From the very first, Marty asked me to trust him.  I did and would trust no one else; neither should you!!!

reviews.name: Kevin Steinberg
reviews.text: The Pospischil Realty Group is very professional in their approach to real estate transactions. I thoroughly recommend them to anyone  looking to buy or sell property. From our first meeting, I was impressed with their targeted and systematic approach. They work hard for you, no stones are left unturned and this paid off in them helping us conclude a successful transaction.  Thank you to Marty and his team for making this experience a rewarding experience.

reviews.name: pamela trant
reviews.text: Marty and his team were able to work at lightening speed (which I think is their normal) to get our condo listed for sale. The weekend hosted 2 open houses and had 75 people walking through! We entertained 4 very competitive offers and sold well above list price with NO subjects! The sale was completed 1 week after listing! The process was fast, efficient, and actually enjoyable! Marty communicated throughout the whole process and always seemed to have time to answer my many questions. I can not recommend Marty and his team enough. If buying or selling in Vancouver, these are the folks you want representing you. Hands down.

reviews.name: L
reviews.text: We are very satisfied with assistance received while purchasing our condo! Charley was great and his advice to us spot-on. We were successful bidders for the property we wanted and Charley played a big part in our success.

reviews.name: Christine Chourmouzis
reviews.text: Thanks to Marty, the right couple found my apartment - people that my neighbours will enjoy and who will love their new home and community as much as I have.

reviews.name: Pamela Henker
reviews.text: Anytime your are selling  your home is going to be stressful and unsettling, no matter how long you have been in the home. Finding a realtor you can trust with your intimate details, who will spend the time listening to your concerns, can be a difficult process. I had been referred to Marty and his team by a very good friend of mine, contacted the firm and was immediately relieved by the team's response. Marty listened to my  concerns, requests and emails, with utmost professionalism. He answered all my emails promptly and kept me up to date with every step of the way. On the evening of the sale, Marty and son Adam were very patient when presenting the offers, and I felt comfortable as they made sure I understood every possible outcome. It was a big decision, and I relied heavily on their guidance, but never felt rushed. As an older person I would have liked more phone calls rather than emails, as I am not tied to my computer as perhaps the younger generation is. I didn't respond as quickly as I would have with a phone call. However the "Back office" feature was very good for keeping track of activity with my sale, and I could refer to it many times, as I became inundated with more activity and interest on my property.  They really took care of me, and for that I am grateful.

reviews.name: Nicole P.
reviews.text: We found a new property to purchase but needed to sell our current home quickly. As return clients we trusted Marty's expertise and followed his and his teams advise on pricing, staging, showings and advertising without hesitation. Sure enough we sold in 4 days, got competing offers, exact terms and over asking price! Marty is a master of his craft and his team are true professionals. We will absolutely use Pospischil Realty Group again and would recommend them to anyone that needs a realtor.

reviews.name: Min Hyung Ryu
reviews.text: I was a client of Charley Lee at Pospischil Realty Group. Charley was knowledgeble, professional, and prompt in helping us find our first home. Pospischil Realty Group's combined experience and knowledge gave confidence and assurance in our purchase.

reviews.name: Anders Ballestad
reviews.text: Thanks so much Marty and team for making both the sale of the old home, and purchase  of the new such a text book, efficient process! Sale took 1 week, and purchase 2 days - that is just plain awesome. I was enjoyable and stress-free - thanks again!

reviews.name: Jamie King
reviews.text: We had a great experience with Adam, Marty and the team when selling and once again had a great experience when buying! Adam's advice when looking at different areas and different types of properties was invaluable and helped us quickly narrow down our search. And his guidance when negotiating was key to getting our new home! It was a tricky situation and we felt completely confident in his approach. We couldn't be happier.

reviews.text: Outstanding service and professionalism! We had initially been working with a different realty group to help sell our home. We weren't too impressed with the first group of realtors we dealt with and soon got in contact with Adam. Adam's team presented us with facts and clarity and were able to sell our home for a good price in a tough market. Highly recommend and will be reaching out to them again when we look at buying another home.

reviews.name: Dave Hobden
reviews.text: I'm very impressed with Marty and his team, both in selling my property and buying it many years ago. If Marty isn't the top realtor in Vancouver, it's by choice. Marty and his team are very effective.

reviews.name: Michael Lam
reviews.text:
Adam Pospischil knows how to be a realtor. The man asks the right questions to not only me, but to the owners and exceeded our expectations every time I see him. They have a lot of fun events set up to get singles, couples and families engaged all year ie. pumpkin patch, renting out an entire threatre to watch the newest Star Wars

They're not just a normal realty group, they make it seem like you are part of the family with one of the quickest response time I have ever witnessed.

Highly recommend if someone is buying or selling their home(s)!

reviews.name: Aleck Ostry
reviews.text: Marty and his team are superb. The market has turned down in Vancouver and selling in a down market is when you need a great realtor. Marty and his team are personable, they do a ton of good research to help get pricing right (which matters a ton in this kind of market), and they work very very hard. These are good realtors who really know their business well. I am very pleased with the service they gave me which ended up in the successful sale of my townhouse.

reviews.name: Nick Lung
reviews.text: As a first time home buyer I can say that working with Pospischil Realty was a very positive and reassuring experience. This team works hard and they are in your corner. Really felt taken care of through out the process which made me feel at ease and confident about my purchase. If you're looking for good realtors who genuinely care I would highly recommend!

reviews.name: Jamie Fraser

reviews.name: Mark Dickeson
reviews.text:
I just cannot say enough good things about the entire Pospischil Team.  Until I met Marty and Adam I never really thought “integrity” and “realtor” would ever be found in the same sentence.  These guys are very genuine and you can tell they care about clients above sales -  very refreshing in a sales-crazed market like Vancouver.

From the initial meeting right through to the closing, Adam was our point man.  As a first time buyer it was a relief to have such an experienced person leading us on what can be a scary journey.  And even now, two years after closing our sale, Team Pospischil continues to stay in touch which just shows they really care about their clients over the long run.

I have recommended these guys to friends entering the market and have no reservations recommending them to anyone.  If you want an honest and hard-working realtor with YOUR best interests in mind then look to Team Pospischil.

reviews.name: L H
reviews.text:
Marty and his realty team were recommended by our lawyer to handle the estate sales for my grandmother’s and parent’s homes six years ago. Through the process, I was impressed with Marty, Adam and David. So, when it was time for me to look for a west side home for ourselves, they were the obvious choice.

David Wu was professional, knowledgeable, understanding, sincere, patient and helpful during our difficult search to find the right house at an attainable price for the big move from the suburbs. With a challenging seller, the negotiations quickly hit a snag and it looked like nothing would satisfy the seller, that’s when Marty and his team kicked it into high gear with a strategy meeting followed by negotiations that resulted in a win-win for us and the seller.  Marty further negotiated for favorable resolutions to get deficiencies repaired. Marty is an exceptional realtor and negotiator.

Thanks to Marty and his team, I’m finally moving back to the west side (and no more insane commutes) after 30 years!

reviews.name: Nam Pham
reviews.text: Thanks to Charley and Paula, we have been able to buy our (very first) dream house within a very short period of time.

Thanks to everyone for all your hard work

Steve and Bev

reviews.text:

Thank you to the team for a great job!

reviews.name: Michel Dion
reviews.text:
We found it!
Thanks to Adam and the Pospischil team for their assistance in finding our next family nest.  Adam's advices and availability were key in finding this lovely property.  Without to mention their reliable ressources and contacts provided during the process.  Saving time and money!

reviews.name: Annie P
reviews.text:
As a first-time home buyer, I wanted to ensure that I was working with realtors who really knew the business and covered all the bases.

I originally planned on working with a friend who was new in the industry but decided that Pospischil Realty Group had everything I was looking for: almost a hundred years of combined experience, extensive real estate knowledge (both for selling and buying), and just overall genuine and client-based service.

I initially met with Adam Pospischil and we walked through the first few steps of buying a home - he was very thorough and I was impressed with the knowledge he had right off the bat. I felt like I could ask him anything and he would know the answer or find it for me. No leaky condos in my future!

David Wu spearheaded my search and tirelessly met me for open houses and viewings. Finally when I found the perfect home (which not many first-time home buyers get to say); his real estate prowess really came out! I can say with 100% certainty that I was only able to have my offer accepted because of his smart and quick thinking, his analysis of the market and his offer strategy.

Getting the phone call from David confirming my offer was accepted was the highlight of 2017; I couldn't have done it without them!

If you're a first-time home buyer, a 20th-time home buyer, or looking to sell your property, I would not hesitate to call Pospischil Realty Group!

reviews.name: yolanda qian
reviews.text: Very good experience. Great team to work with!

reviews.text: I’m very thankful of all your help and guidance, your team has been great to deal with, you performed flawlessly from what I could witness, and delivered as promised. What a great guy! Pete is a very skilled and professional businessman and and expert realtor. reviews.name: Emma McCrudden
reviews.text: We have really enjoyed working with Pete and finally purchased our first home in Vancouver this summer. He has been so generous with his time over the last few years as we went back and forth about entering the Vancouver housing market. Pete spent a lot of time with us weighing up the pros and cons of the different areas in Vancouver and where we could see ourselves living as a family. We saw so many properties and Pete always made time for us to do this. He helped us navigate all the new things we had to learn as first time buyers. He always seemed to be able to make time for us despite his crazy work load! He was very well connected in the real estate industry in the city and gave us great recommendations for all the professionals you need to close the sale. I wouldn’t hesitate to recommend him to anyone thinking of starting their search for a home in Vancouver.

reviews.name: Li-Na Koh
reviews.text:
Pete came highly recommended by a friend when my husband and I first started considering buying a place in Vancouver. Other reviewers get it exactly right when they say he makes you feel like his only client—I have no idea how he does it, but his responses are incredibly speedy and he was always able to set up viewings on very short notice.

On top of his amazing service, Pete also has extensive knowledge of the Vancouver real estate market. He was able to advise on neighborhoods, build quality, strata considerations, etc., and very quickly picked up on our preferences and what we were looking for in a home. We had also only ever purchased property in Singapore, and he was very helpful and patient in guiding us through the process of buying a home in BC.

We must have seen dozens of listings during our search, but Pete was always happy to help schedule and join us for viewings and never appeared to tire of us. You can also count on Pete to be extremely detail-oriented and do all the required due diligence when you're ready to make an offer. We were in the process of preparing an offer on a place when Pete discovered that there was an upcoming hotel development close to the building which would significantly change the views and add years of upcoming construction.

Pete is very well-connected in the industry, and when we finally came across a home that checked all the boxes for us, his relationship with the seller's agent proved to be extremely helpful in closing the deal as quickly as possible (and $40k under asking!). He was also able to refer us to a great mortgage broker, property inspector, and real estate lawyer, which made the process of offering and closing a very smooth one.

I definitely recommend choosing Pete as your realtor, and would engage his services again without hesitation in the future!

reviews.name: Sonia
reviews.text:
I am a second time client of Pete's and will continue to rely on him going forward.  He is personable, professional and cuts the B.S. 🙂  I became aware of Pete through a referral and will continue to recommend him to anyone in need of a realtor.

Thanks again Pete!

reviews.name: Francis Leduc
reviews.text: Pete was highly recommended by friends of ours and he did not disappoint! We were first home buyers and Pete guided us through the experience seamlessly. He thought us a lot and actually made the entire process a lot of fun and less stressful! 10 out of 10!

reviews.text: As first time home buyers, we were reasonably naive to how everything works. Not only did he take care of setting up viewings, he also helped connect us to all the extra people you need to seal the deal. Thanks!

reviews.name: Nick Lewis
reviews.text: Pete's a joy to work with - he's patient and understanding, and I always had a sense that he was looking out for my best interest. He helped me find exactly what I was looking for and negotiated a great price. Can't recommend him enough.

reviews.name: Calvin Duck
reviews.text: We are first-time home buyers and Pete was very good at helping us navigate the complex process that is buying a home. From start to finish he was always responding to our questions and making himself available to view homes and ultimately buy our brand new home at a fantastic price. Aside from showing us homes, Pete also has an extensive network of associated trades, which was extremely useful when it came time to find a home inspector, a real estate lawyer, and even a banker. If you want to spend your time looking at houses rather than dealing with all the little things that need to be done when buying a home, then I cannot recommend Pete highly enough.

reviews.text: Pete will make your experience as easy as you can imagine. He's efficient, professional, proactive and energetic! It was such a pleasure working with Pete - he did a simply excellent job selling my property.
