reviews.text: Pete is super knowledgeable on the Vancouver market, helping us through navigate the trade offs of different condo buildings, townhouses, duplexes, and houses. He's been invaluable in helping us find the right home in Vancouver for us! In selling our condo as we upsized, Pete was great at reading the market and helping us get the sale we were looking for.

reviews.name: Marc Coderre
reviews.text: My wife and I were first time homebuyers and Pete made the experience incredible. He knows the market like none other and is an incredible negotiator. I would 100% recommend Pete and if we ever need a new home, I'll be going back to Pete!

reviews.name: Luke Armstrong
reviews.text: Pete was great from the very start of our first home buying experience. He was always available when we had questions and was clearly looking out for our best interest. Would highly recommend Pete and his team

reviews.name: Heather Robertson
reviews.text:
From start to finish, our process with Pete was everything we could have asked for.

From photos, to brochures, to online presence, our home was marketed exceptionally. Pete and his team did an excellent job of getting our listing out to market in impeccable timing while bringing in serious and meaningful interest.

Pete’s collected, calm nature helps to put what can be a stressful time at ease. He is also fast acting. The speed of which we were able to sell our home with an offer we were happy with proves his experience in the market.

reviews.name: Gloria Mason
reviews.text:
This is a long overdue review.  I was looking for an investment property in Fall 2019.  Having already bought / sold homes a few times over the last 2+ decades and thus have wide experience (good and bad) with different realtors, I tried to make this purchase on my own -- without a realtor.

Long story short, in the end, I did work with a realtor.  I chose Pete Shpak and I am still grateful 1 year later for all his assistance and advice.  He's the best.

Pete is a great guy - incredibly hard working and professional.  You'll get that from reading all his other reviews.   What really stands out for me is that Pete is value-added. He gave me information I didn't have access to - and I'm pretty good at research and digging for information on my own.   Pete is a great listener.   He heard me out and understood exactly what I wanted. He didn't waste my time. He knows what he is doing.  He has opinions and will let you know what he thinks - but he doesn't force his views on you.    He's also a brilliant negotiator.  You can't go wrong.

Two more reasons why Pete exceeds expectations and stands out from other realtors:  (1) Pete understands the market;  and (2) Pete knows his data.  Pete was the first realtor in Vancouver who offered "previously sold" prices on the internet before other realtors started doing it.  While assessed values of properties are available to everyone, only realtors had previously sold prices.  I was digging deep on google for data on my own and was able to access Pete's data even before I met him!!  It was only a coincidence we ended up speaking on the phone.

During my search, Pete steered me towards a newer / popular building with a great reputation.  It was very nice - but I found the unit small and expensive for price per square footage.  I had wanted a larger footprint for that price.  Nevertheless, I ended up buying the newer / smaller unit in January 2020 and inherited the tenant that came with the unit.

Fast forward to end of August 2020 - my tenant advised she had to leave.  Given the global pandemic (and landlords in the West End and Downtown were offering first & last months rent for free over summer 2020) I was prepared to have the investment unit sit empty.  Boy - was I wrong.  I had a dozen queries in the first 8 hours of posting and almost 40 interested renters over 2 days.  Received 2 applications within the first 48 hours.  There was a HUGE demand and I had NO IDEA.  I found a wonderful new tenant within days after checking her references.

Pete told me the building had a great reputation and was a solid investment for me.  He was totally right!  I'm not worried about having to rent that place out again if my current tenant decides to leave.

I could go on about what a great, hard-working guy Pete is -  but I'm sure his clients have got that covered in all the other reviews.   Life has been busy and we've all had our issues to deal with - but now that 2020 is finally over, it will be nice to move on from last year.  Pete was one of the silver linings from 2020 - someone I met and who brought value and good advice and someone I would be delighted to work with again should I have the opportunity to do so in the future.     Thanks so much Pete!

reviews.name: Federico Angel
reviews.text: Pete helped my wife and I with the purchase of our new home. Buying your first house is extremely stressful and you feel like everyone is speaking a foreign language half of the time, but thanks to Pete he was able to guide my wife and I into a great deal and allow us to make a great purchase. If it wasn't for Pete and his amazing attention to detail and persistence I know we would not have our home right now.  I would 100% recommend Pete and his team to anyone looking to buy or sell in Vancouver and the surrounding areas. Thanks again for everything Pete!!!

reviews.name: Sheldon Hiemstra
reviews.text: Pete has both sold and purchased a home for us in Vancouver, and in both cases we we’re very impressed with his professionalism, pulse on the market, and great advice in all aspects around the real estate transaction. Pete always acted with integrity and never pressured us to buy or sell quickly, but provided sound advice around market trends. I highly recommend anyone to work with Pete if they’re buying or selling a home in Vancouver, as it makes a huge difference working with an agent you can trust.

reviews.name: Ian Stotesbury
reviews.text: I connected with Pete by chance when looking at some real estate online. After chatting with him and looking at his rave reviews online I thought he might be a great person to sell my condo.  When I first met Pete in person  he  came across as very professional and knowledgable about real estate in the area.  Pete and his team were great, although we didn't have to work too long on selling our place, as it sold in under three days!  During the process Pete and his team gave us some great advice and the end result was very positive.  Pete is a good communicator and I felt very confident in his abilities as a realtor.  I am currently working with Pete in finding another condo in Vancouver.  Pete is timely, professional, knowledgable and a great communicator.

reviews.name: David Penner
reviews.text: Pete was great to work with as first time buyers. He was very available when we had questions and didn't push us to buy, even pointing out a few issues we hadn't considered on one condo we were otherwise considering. We'll be going back to Pete in the future, I'm sure!

reviews.name: Tamer Aburamadan
reviews.text: Knew his stuff, the area, the procedures and documents, and provided excellent advice. Would highly recommend him.

reviews.name: Chris Zapadka
reviews.text: Working with Pete was a great experience!  He sold our condo quickly and made buying our new house a smooth process.  He was very knowledgeable and had reliable connections to all the resources we needed(staging, lawyer, inspector, contractor...).  Always there to answer our questions, we really felt that Pete had our best interests at heart!  I would recommend Pete to anyone who is looking for a realtor.

reviews.name: parikhsa77
reviews.text: Pete is hands down the best realtor we have ever worked with.  During our search, he used technology, market knowledge, and construction knowledge to make sure my wife and I made the most informed and best decision for our needs. Pete was always available for any questions we had, and he always put our interests first (which is a rare trait in the real estate world). Based on his own educational background, experience, and experts he knows, Pete made sure every detail of our transaction was explained and understood.  We could not recommend Pete more highly! You will not find a more trustworthy agent.

reviews.name: Anjuli Enthoven
reviews.text: Pete was an absolute pleasure to work with,  was really knowledgeable about Vancouver and it's real estate. He was very quick to respond and wonderful to have as my realtor. I would recommend him fully.

reviews.name: Jenny Wang
reviews.text: Pete is the best realtor we could've asked for! He is is very knowledgeable about the market and after hearing our preferences, knew exactly which area would be perfect for us! He is also extremely patient and thoughtful - always providing his honest guidance and recommendations which was much appreciated! Thanks so much Pete!

reviews.name: Jennifer Messina
reviews.text: Pete is an amazing realtor and really goes above and beyond to help his clients. He also treats you like gold! It was a pleasure!

reviews.name: Billy Quirke
reviews.text: Pete was rock solid helping us understand the housing market and getting us into our first home. Super well connected, attentive and knowledgeable.

reviews.name: Natascha Kogler
reviews.text: I met Pete almost 10 years ago when I purchased an apartment in Olympic Village.  Since then I have sold and purchased 5 properties in the lower mainland.  Every time Pete has gone above and beyond to make the transaction seamless, not to mention getting me the best deals and top dollar for my resales.  I have very high expectations in business and Pete has always gone above and beyond to meet them.  He is definitely top notch and an expert in all areas of real estate.  I would strongly recommend Pete!  -- Natascha

reviews.name: Sien Fan
reviews.text: Pete and his team goes above and beyond expectations to help you during the selling and buying process. From the very beginning and through the entire process he was super helpful, personable, knowledgeable, professional, and always quick to respond to any questions I had. 100% recommend!!! Thank you Pete!

reviews.name: Najib Hatahet
reviews.text: Pete is hands down the best in the business, very knowledgeable and patient. I worked with Pete multiple times on buying and selling and couldn’t be happier.

reviews.name: Conor Fleming
reviews.text:
We had a great experience working with Pete on the purchase of our first condo in Vancouver. We found him to be an enthusiastic and skilled professional, with a genuine desire to help us find the perfect home. Pete invested considerable time and effort in our search over several months, arranging regular viewings, providing useful information and insight on each property, and responding promptly to our many questions. In a highly competitive market, we really benefited from Pete's tactical advice and excellent communication during the offer/negotiation stage.

Overall it was an absolute pleasure to work with Pete, and without a doubt he reduced the stress and uncertainty of this process for us. We would certainly recommend him to to other home buyers, and we look forward to working with him again in the future!

reviews.name: Bloch Real Estate Team
reviews.text: I just want to add an industry endorsement to this wonderful Realtor and his team. As a Toronto Realtor, If I should refer anyone moving to Vancouver, I refer them to Pete, for his excellence in service and client care.

reviews.name: Sara Padidar
reviews.text: Working with Pete means ensuring that you truly will have some one on your side, taking the time to educate and advocate for your needs. Pete opened our eyes to the idea of building our own home - an option we assumed was out of reach. After months of searching listings, he proactively worked to find us the perfect lot. His patience with us during the process blew me away. His consistency and positivity kept us motivated and his honesty and communication was incredible. If you are looking for a realtor in Vancouver, Pete is without a doubt, the guy to call.

reviews.name: Natasha Ancelin
reviews.text: Working with Pete was a seamless and comfortable endeavor. The real estate market can be intimidating and at times over whelming, but Pete is a true professional who guided us through the process of selling our condo and purchasing our first house with ease and confidence. Pete helped us navigate putting an offer on a house before we listed our condo, which can be very unnerving. But he explained everything very clearly, at times explaining it more than once and made sure we were comfortable with each step. He also provided an excellent service to us by promptly having our condo professionally cleaned, photographed, videoed and measured. He followed that up with excellent marketing and after less than 2 weeks of making an offer on a new home we had sold our condo above asking price, and then moved 30 days later. During this whirlwind Pete was available at anytime via phone, email, text and he made numerous trips out to meet with us to discuss everything in great detail. Although we were not his only clients during this time, we felt like we were his first priority and he was on top each and every detail involved in the quick purchase and sale. Pete is very approachable, personable and extremely knowledgeable. He is the type of guy you want to be friends with and have over for dinner in your new home! We would highly recommend his superior realty services to both the first time home buyer and the seasoned home purchaser.

reviews.name: Megan Alyssa Young
reviews.text: Pete made the purchase of our first our home a fun and easy experience. We are so grateful to have found such a great realtor! He provided us thoughtful, honest advice throughout the entire process, and with his knowledge and expertise, we always felt comfortable in our decisions. He made sure we felt no pressure to rush into any offers and was always available to answer our (many) questions. He took the time to get to know us and what was important to us in finding a home, and his guidance was essential for navigating the competitive Vancouver market. He was able to set us up with great mortgage brokers, inspectors and lawyers, and remained involved throughout the entire process to make sure everything was seamless. We would absolutely recommend Pete to anyone looking to buy a home!

reviews.name: Shamayah Sarrucco
reviews.text: Working with Pete was really a great experience! He did an amazing job in selling our condo in Yaletown. Especially as we were not in Vancouver it was very valuable to have a realtor we could rely on. (We never even met in person). Pete kept us very well-informed and he took care of everything. As a result of his brilliant marketing strategy and his professional approach, we sold our condo above the asking price. The process was smooth, effortless and very well-organized. Pete's communication skills and personal service are exceptional. Whether you're looking to buy or sell a house, I highly recommend Pete Shpak.

reviews.name: Kristin Lautrup
reviews.text: We were very fortunate to meet Pete at an open house that he was hosting on the first day we started looking to buy a home.  As buyers, we didn't think we needed a realtor, but Pete knew better.  Even though we didn't meet him through anyone we knew, right from day one we found Pete to be personable, professional, honest and trustworthy.  Over a beer, he taught us about the buying process, and on our first tour, he helped us discover what was truly important to us in a home.  It was clear to us that Pete was in it for the relationship, not just a quick sale - it was important to him to find us the right place.  Pete is patient and a great listener, and he made it easy for us to ask him any and all questions that we had.  He knew the answer to just about everything, and we appreciated that he also took the time to teach us along the way.  When it came time to put forward an offer, he provided valuable advice on how to best position ourselves for success.  Once our offer was accepted, Pete continued to support us through his great network of people.  He was able to connect us with experts in each field, from lawyers to house inspectors to interior decorators.  Throughout the whole process Pete was flexible and accommodating – he would meet us when and where was most convenient for us, even after hours at our offices if need be.  To top it all off Pete made our search relaxed and fun, we really looked forward to each time we got to meet with him to see something new.  At the end of the day, we are in a home we love, and we won’t hesitate to recommend Pete to everyone we know.

reviews.name: Andrina Fawcett
reviews.text: Pete is the best! My family and I had the pleasure of working with Pete earlier this year to sell my mom’s condo. Pete and his team made it so easy and offered so much peace of mind by handling everything for us. He went above and beyond to make sure everything went as smoothly as possible, and he got us several offers well above asking price! Cannot recommend him enough — we will definitely be working with Pete again!

reviews.name: E RG
reviews.text:
Before we looked to list our home, we interviewed several agents.  Pete was the only one who could find the house without directions and who kindly modified his schedule to fit our last minute changes and....he gave us the gift of time to ask questions and find out to he was and listened to us as we let him know what we needed.
We never looked back and he professionally guided us to a sale in 10 days.  He let us know what we needed to do, contacting us and guiding us through the next steps in the process.  As ever, he was available to answer questions and deal with issues that popped up.
As the countdown to the closing date grew closer he gifted us the wonder of having a cleaning service come in.  This was a godsend and was wholly appreciated and welcomed!!
We'd highly recommend Pete to friends and family.  He is professional, calm and efficient in getting the job done.  Thanks again Pete!

reviews.name: Einar Einarsson
reviews.text:
My wife and I recently bought our first apartment with the help of Pete. We found Pete to be a top top-notch professional who provided us with guidance along every step of the way. Pete was always available and gave us crystal clear honest advice with no pressure. After looking for a while in this difficult market we were, admittedly, willing to bid on a property that was not entirely to our satisfaction but were thankfully steered away by Pete who advised us not to compromise. Soon thereafter we found a perfect place that we successfully bid on with Pete’s invaluable assistance.

Very approachable and all-around great guy, Pete also has a great network of people that he referred us to, from mortgage broker, to contractors to work on our new place. Can’t go wrong with Pete!

reviews.name: C K
reviews.text: We are so happy with Pete’s services, he put genuine efforts to finding us our home and also as important, he listened to our needs. Pete was always prompt in communicating with us and he was always prepared with building/area information. Pete’s knowledge of Vancouver is remarkable. Pete provided us with honest advice about asking prices and offers; we truly felt we had his support all the way. Pete is diligent and dedicated; we would recommend highly recommend him. Thank you again Pete for all your hard work.

reviews.name: Mark Goodwin
reviews.text:
My wife and I feel extremely fortunate to have had the opportunity to work with Pete while seeking and purchasing our first home. After meeting Pete and going on our first ’home tour’, we knew we were very lucky to have him on our side. His knowledge of everything home related was exceptional. He had an answer to every question we asked - and often brought up important points that we never would have thought of. There are many traits that set Pete apart, but one really stands out: he cares. He was always honest with us, and he struck a perfect balance between listening and being responsive to our feedback while also speaking up based on his impeccable intuition. He was not afraid to tell us when he didn’t think the fit was right.

Once it was time to make an offer, he had us prepared in every possible way; it gave us the edge in a highly competitive situation. We now have a home that was beyond our highest expectations (and at a price that was below what we had budgeted for). All thanks to Pete. I’m gushing a bit in this review but I’ll also throw in that he is just a great guy who is fun to be around. You will absolutely not regret working with Pete!

reviews.name: Alison Stafford
reviews.text:
Pete did an incredible job throughout the whole selling and buying process - I am so happy to recommend him.
He cares about his clients and as a first-time buyer I appreciated his guidance and honest input. He was professional, organized, knowledgeable, accessible, and positive. He really invested his time and expertise into each detail. We absolutely would not have had such a great outcome without him! He took care of every step along the way and made a big transition go extremely well.
Thanks Pete!

reviews.name: Chris N
reviews.text: Pete did an incredible job selling my townhouse.  He organized the staging, cleaning, and anything else that could make the process easier for me.  He is incredibly knowledgeable about the local market and pushes for the best deal, rather than the quickest sale.  I'm very confident that I got more for my townhouse with Pete than I would have with another realtor.  I can't recommend him highly enough.

reviews.name: Cathy Kwan
reviews.text:
Its All in the Details with Pete!

Pete has been amazing to work with in dealing with the sale of our townhouse and purchase of our new home.  We are an extremely busy family with 3 young kids, and Pete went above and beyond at each step of selling our townhouse to the interaction and purchase for our new home.  Even though we know that Pete has several clients, we felt that we were his only client.  This was due to his outstanding communication and client service skills! He was very quick to respond to our many questions and was very prompt at answering e-mails.  Pete was also very knowledgeable in the details of selling and purchasing our home, even recommending an excellent home inspector and following up with us throughout the legal process.  Not only is his attention to detail second to none, he was also very flexible with working within our busy family and work schedules.  We were also impressed with Pete's professionalism, patience during negotiations, and highly trusted his sound advice. We would not hesitate in recommending Pete - especially if you are looking for a trustworthy, professional, client-oriented, and knowledgeable realtor.

reviews.name: Ashton Miller
reviews.text: Pete provided first class service from the first meeting up until signing the papers a few months later. He always made us feel that we were his only clients, no matter how busy he was.  After one or two tours with him, he got a feel for what we were looking for and took charge from there finding extra units for us to look at.  The condo we purchased wasn't even on our radar, but he know we'd like it.  He took us to it on a tour and a couple days later it was ours!  Outside of his great personal skills and vast knowledge of the market, Pete is a very shrewd negotiator.  He helped us get an excellent deal on the price and with the furniture to boot! I can't recommend Pete enough, I wouldn't hesitate to trust him with any sale or purchase. Way to go Pistol Pete!

reviews.name: Shal M
reviews.text:
Working with Pete was great, start to finish (and even after finish). We were looking for a new home with more space and Pete was able to find us something we loved, quickly. He was all over the details and didn't let any question go unanswered or any potential issue unaddressed. We were very confident throughout the process of our purchase thanks to Pete.

We were especially impressed with Pete during the sale of our downtown condo. He had a solid plan to sell our place and was considerate enough to plan showings around our toddler's schedule. The week we had our condo for sale Pete showed our place to a large number of buyers which ultimately gave us a selection of offers to consider.

Pete's professionalism, knowledge of the market, and above all, communication make him easy to refer to friends or family looking to buy or sell a home.

reviews.name: Alberto Alonso
reviews.text:
Pete did a remarkable job selling my condo. It was so easy to work with him throughout the entire process. Not only he is very knowledgeable and full of self-confidence, but I could also see his honesty and humility from our very first meeting and that’s what distinguish him from other realtors.
In less than 3 weeks my unit was sold; after the first open house we got 3 offers (all above the listing price). I finally accepted an offer higher than my best estimate.
Pete and his team took care of all the details and guided me in the decision making. I enthusiastically recommend Pete as your realtor. He is a great professional and a great person.

reviews.name: Dave Mah
reviews.text: What can I say about Pete?  Pete is more than just any old realtor.  He was attentive to our needs and was always realistic and positive.  He doesn't sugar coat the realities of property investment when it came to buying a new home for our family and his opinions put us on a short path to fulfilling the  requirements of what we sought.  In addition to his professionalism and availability to us, Pete showed us that he genuinely cared about where we wanted our family to be in this next stage of life, and he did a stand out job in facilitating the whole process with his knowledge, expertise and professional contacts.

reviews.name: Jeff Howard
reviews.text: Pete was amazing in helping us with the purchase of our first home. What we appreciated the most was that he wasn't pushy when we didn't know what we wanted and allowed us time to figure it out, but once we found something we liked he jumped right in with both feet to help secure the place.  Great involvement and timing - it's a tough balance, not too much but always there when we needed him.  He was easily contacted and responded right away- patient and thorough with us first time buyers.  He had the technical knowledge and he knew the right questions to ask the home inspector and selling agent.  He's a great guy to have on your side and we'll recommend him to anyone looking to buy or sell a home.  Thanks Pete!

reviews.name: shagufta khursheed
reviews.text: I was a first time buyer and Pete made the whole experience go very smoothly. He listened to my criteria was and within a few short weeks I had put in an offer and now am a proud home owner! He also put me in contact with a well respected broker and legal team which made things so much easier for me. I would use Pete s services again without hesitation

reviews.name: Raymond Zhang
reviews.text: Through my interactions with Pete, I found him to be an outstanding realtor that works tirelessly for his clients to provide them with advice and guidance. I purchased my first home with Pete, and he utilized his talents in finding me the right home within my budget, negotiating a great deal on my behalf, and responding quickly to my questions and requests no matter how big or small. Pete was always focused on finding me the right home and looked at things from my perspective, which I found extremely helpful. I would not hesitate to recommend Pete because he is dedicated to his work, and always puts his clients' interests first! Thanks Pete!

reviews.name: Tania Leon
reviews.text: Pete helped us sell and purchase our new home and we couldn’t be happier with how seamless the whole process went. From the start, Pete was incredibly accessible and helpful in providing us with honest, knowledgeable and professional advice to help us understand the market and our best options. Pete helped us immensely with negotiating the best offers and we felt prepared to confidently make our decisions. He is super easy to work and discuss ideas with, and you can tell that he puts a lot of effort into making positive, ongoing relationships. Even after moving in, he’s checked in on us and still helps us out with a few questions here and there! It has been a pleasure to have him as our realtor and we would highly recommend Pete to anyone who is looking to be in good hands.

reviews.name: Ori Harel
reviews.text:
Absolutely fantastic Realtor. We were first time home buyers and new to Canada. Luckily, we found Pete, he was patient, professional, experienced, and very knowledgeable.
Pete held our hand throughout the entire process and made sure we were getting everything we need. He always gave us all the information we needed in no time. In the end we were able to find the exact property we were looking for and make the purchase.
We are extremely happy with Pete's work and definitely will hire his services in the future if needed.

reviews.name: cssterling
reviews.text:
PETE SHPAAK IS THE BEST!!

Pete was unbelievable during the entire process of looking for a place to receiving the keys to my new home. I was completely inexperienced in the field of real estate and Pete provided professionalism, respect, patience and expertise to help me make the decisions which were in my best interest. In the end, I got the perfect place at a great price and never really stressed at all about the specifics.

While looking for the perfect place, Pete was extremely patient and creative in showing me different properties. Despite how many times I said that I didn't like a place, Pete never showed even a frown. He always maintained his positive persistence that eventually, when the time and place were right, we would find the perfect place. And, we did!

What I appreciate most about Pete is that he was always very professional, but most of all trustworthy. He has experience with a wonderful team of lawyers, inspectors, insurance agents and everyone whose services we enlisted, based solely on Pete's recommendation, were excellent.

I'll just re-emphasize that I knew nothing about doing anything of the things we did and I actually can't believe that it all happened so easily.

Thank you Pete!

reviews.name: Luis Kam
reviews.text:
Pete Shpak helped my now fiance and I purchase our first home together. It was great working with him! He is a great individual in all respects – very knowledge, approachable, honest and responsive.

We found a pre-sale apartment and engaged Pete as our realtor to guide us through the process. As this was our first purchase we were unsure about and overwhelmed by the real estate market and purchasing process. Pete made us feel comfortable from the first moment we met him and throughout the entire way. He explained the process clearly, provided his insights on the market and the developer of our apartment, and how to approach the negotiation. Between the 20 months we purchased and took possession of the apartment, Pete stayed in constant communication with us and checked in periodically, which showed his commitment and care.

We couldn’t have asked for a better realtor than Pete – we highly recommend him!

reviews.name: Maleah Meakin
reviews.text: My husband & I worked with Pete to sell our townhouse in Vancouver.  He definitely went above and beyond to help arrange everything to get our townhouse ready to sell.  We were really pleased with how quickly the property sold and the price we were able to get (above asking!)  Pete was extremely professional, responsive to our questions and very knowledgeable about the local market.  We highly recommend Pete to anyone!

reviews.name: Alec Leverton
reviews.text: From the beginning until the end, Pete was a professional and extremely helpful with all the questions we had. As first time buyers, we had many. Pete wasn't the 'salesman' that this industry is flooded with, if anything he was the Devil's Advocate. Challenging us with each viewing to make sure it worked for our day-to-day and long term needs. He's a genuine and polite chap with a great focus on finding the perfect home. We found it, and we couldn't thank you enough, Pete! See you again soon!

reviews.name: Sonia Leal-serafim
reviews.text:
Absolutely thrilled.

I can't say enough about how happy and impressed we are with Pete Shpak.  Not only did he find us the perfect home in our number one choice  location (which we thought was impossible for us), but sold our place at more than asking.

In such a complicated and fast moving real estate market that Vancouver is right now, he not only found us the perfect home, but guided us to making wise real estate investment choices almost as if it were his own.  He facilitated every step of the way, explained every single detail that seemed most confusing to me, and has such an amazing team that he works with.  From his awesome mortgage broker, to talented photographer and easy to deal with lawyer.  Every single step of the way of what seemed like the most intimidating process, was so easy with Pete.  All with him being so patient, professional, kind and an absolute pleasure to deal with.  It's clear that he knows what he's doing and loves what he does.  I'm recommending him to all my friends.

reviews.name: Mona Erfani
reviews.text: We recently worked with Pete to sell our condo and he exceeded our expectations with the amount of time and effort he put into it. We were so happy with Pete’s services. He was professional, knowledgeable and understands the market very well. Our property sold quickly and above asking price. I would like to thank him again!

reviews.name: Magnus Byne
reviews.text:
Pete provides superior service. Having worked with Pete in a buying and selling context, I would strongly recommend him.

Straight-forward and strategic. Pete is practical, pragmatic and well informed. He makes things easy. His knowledge and experience pays off.

reviews.name: Stephanie Williams
reviews.text: I'm so glad I chose Pete to handle my home search and purchase - from our first meeting, I knew we would work well together  -  every step of the way Pete was patient, positive, informative and supportive - he really listened to my thoughts about what I was looking for and kept me on course.  Pete is exceptionally knowledgeable about Vancouver real estate - plus he's friendly and the ultimate pro.  I highly recommend him.  Thanks, Pete - couldn't have done this without you!

reviews.name: Tina Henderson
reviews.text:
Once you go Shpak, you never go back!

I have absolutely nothing but great things to say about my experience working with Pete Shpak! I recently climbed aboard the mighty Vancouver real-estate ladder, purchasing my first apartment under Pete's guidance, support, and expertise. He instills full confidence, and you can rest assured, knowing that you are in his capable hands. In addition to being incredibly knowledgeable and well versed, he's also a warm, personable and all-around great guy.

From beginning to end, he guided us through the multiple stages of defining our brief, house-hunting, preparing to put in an offer and closing.  He genuinely wants the best for you and will work tirelessly until you find your perfect home!  What sets him apart from other realtors is his deep understanding of Vancouver's real estate market, navigating the often complex landscape of researching properties, getting under the hood so to speak, asking the right questions and ultimately helping you take the leap! I highly recommend Pete and would without a doubt, use his services again when we decide to buy, sell or move homes!

reviews.name: Brad Humble
reviews.text: Before I started working with Pete, I was with another realtor who misled me to try and make a quick sale. Working with Pete was a night and day difference. His honesty and integrity was evident right from the start. Even with several clients, he had seemingly endless amounts of time to help find the right home. He answers emails and fulfills requests promptly – often within minutes. He also put together an offer for me while he was on vacation out of the country. That kind of commitment to customer service certainly puts Pete in a class all by himself. His hard work was greatly appreciated and won’t soon be forgotten. I will be recommending Pete to my friends when they need a realtor that they can trust.

reviews.name: Meghan Hussack
reviews.text: I could not be happier with my decision to work with Pete for my first home purchase, and my experience could not have been any better.  Being new to the process, he was great at giving me a heads up at what to expect every step of the way.  I've had friends who felt pressure from their realtors to rush into buying or selling, and I appreciate that he genuinely wanted to ensure that I was happy in my final decision.  He took the time to accompany me to every place that I wanted to see, and by asking me the right questions, he was able to really understand want I valued, and guide me to a building I hadn't even considered - and I am so glad he did!    Sometimes as the buyer your vision can be a little clouded, and his experience and professionalism meant he was able to provide great advice and market insight.  I am so happy he took the time to find the perfect place for me, and helped me get it for a price I am really happy with.  I truly had the best experience, and recommend him to anyone looking to buy or sell.

reviews.name: Thomas Lyle
reviews.text: Pete was recommended by a trusted friend. As we are out of town, he handled all aspects of our condo sale, and got us multiple offers in just over a week. He always replied immediately to our questions, and was a pleasure to work with. We would highly recommend him to anyone.

reviews.name: Stephanie Chung
reviews.text: My significant other and I found the perfect first home with the help of Pete. He took the time to understand our needs, listened to our concerns and put in a lot of time and effort into helping us  find the perfect match. He is a very patient and approachable agent to work with. Highly recommend!!

reviews.name: Blake Steinson
reviews.text: Pete recently helped me with the sale of two condominiums. I could not be happier with the advice and service he provided. Both properties sold quickly and above asking price. In fact, one of them sold for $121,000 OVER ASKING! The other property was part of an estate sale, and Pete's experience and advice saved me hours of work and thousands of dollars in costs. Anyone who has served as executor of an estate knows how much work that is, and Pete made the sale of the Property quick and easy. I can't thank him enough for that help. I would recommend Pete to anyone looking for the absolute best real estate experience.

reviews.name: Diana Trasolini
reviews.text: Pete was helpful, professional, informative and always available during both the purchase and sale of my town home in North Vancouver. For the sale, I had multiple offers and got over asking price, which I was very please with! Anything that I needed and any questions that I had were always answered thoroughly and promptly. I plan to use Pete for my next real estate purchase and recommend him to anyone looking to buy or sell!

reviews.name: Lindsay Moore
reviews.text:
From the moment we first met with Pete to the moment we closed the deal on our first home, we felt as though we were his only clients. His attentiveness and desire to fulfill our needs was beyond impressive and made the entire process, which could have been stressful and tiring, comfortable and enjoyable. Pete’s high level of service and knowledge combined with his charismatic personality made him a joy to work with. We wouldn’t have wanted to deal with anyone else and we already know who we will be calling when it comes to selling our place.
Lindsay & Scott

reviews.name: Kelly Maguire
reviews.text: Pete was amazing! We had the best experience with the sale of our home. Pete really took great care of us and we would highly recommend him.

reviews.name: Gordie Sawers
reviews.text:
Sarah and I contacted Pete in order to get the ball rolling on an apartment we wanted to buy sometime the following year. Four weeks later we signed the deed.
Its no surprise though once you meet Pete; his personable nature immediately made us feel comfortable and his no-pressure approach and detailed knowledge of Vancouver’s Market certainly gave us all the reason needed to trust that our best interests were at the forefront.
After our first meeting to get to know us, and what we were looking for, Pete took us on an "educational" tour to give us an idea of the current market, some examples of the red flags to look out for, as well as some of the lesser known positives that we would not have considered otherwise. We really enjoyed being ‘taught’ rather than ‘told’ and this gave us confidence that we were making an informed decision when we decided to buy.
If you are looking for property in the Vancouver area, Pete is your man. Whether you jump on an opportunity that you can’t refuse, like us or play the long game, Pete will help you through every step of the way until you find the property that checks all the boxes.
Much appreciated Pete!

reviews.name: Brittney Collins
reviews.text: We've partnered with Pete over the past 7 years and he's a fantastic Vancouver real estate agent. Pete has extensive knowledge of the Vancouver market, he's personable and efficient. He has a great network within the industry and we've been extremely happy with the two homes we purchased through Pete. Pete is a great communicator and we appreciated that he answered all of our questions so quickly. I highly recommend using him for your next home hunt!

reviews.name: Charlotte Pyle
reviews.text:
Pete is the BEST!  I'm relatively new to Vancouver and, while I owned a condo previously in California, I knew nothing about buying property in Canada.  Not only did Pete explain everything I could possibly want to know, he also knew a ton of info about all the various buildings/stratas.

Pete was able to get me a price that I'm extremely happy with on a home that I've just moved into.  I absolutely love it!

I highly recommend using Pete as your realtor.  He will work really hard for you, and is an all around lovely guy as well!  I could not have asked for a better home-buying experience!!

reviews.name: Reid Robinson
reviews.text: Pete helped my fiancée and I purchase and sell our first home. We had a realtor before working with Pete that we never felt understood what we were looking for. In the first meeting with Pete we knew he would be different. He was attentive to understand our needs as individuals. Pete is really knowledgeable about the housing market as well which is incredibly helpful. We've recommended Pete to a number of our friends and everyone has had a great experience.

reviews.name: Anders Hammerberg
reviews.text: As a first time home-buyer I could not be more happy with the service Pete provided. From our initial meeting and through viewings, negotiating the purchase and closing, Pete was extremely knowledgeable and thorough. He was an excellent communicator and kept me updated every step along the way. Pete was simply fantastic to work with!

reviews.name: JP Letnick
reviews.text:
Pete was very helpful with the purchase of my condo.
He made the process simple for me by making sure everything was in order and letting me know if things were missing.

I highly recommend Pete to help get your friends off the street :D

reviews.name: Maryam S
reviews.text:
Seriously, I never recommend anything or anyone unless I am “wow-ed” and I take referrals very seriously. I hold a sense of accountability that comes with referring someone.

Pete Shpak is hands down, THE BEST REALTOR that we have come across. We don’t have a single negative thing to say about him and tons of positive.

Professionalism: He is as professional as it gets. Punctual and always prepared. He took us for tours and had all showings ready to go, prepped and knowledgeable about properties and areas. He wasn’t just  trying to make a quick sale, and you can tell by how much time and effort he put into us as clients.
Experience: Real estate is what he does. This is not just some side hustle. This is his craft and it shows from his experience with the market.
Friendliness: He is genuinely a good person and always friendly.
Honesty: Always real and honest with all his advice and tips. Never made recommendations based on the sale price, but based on actual honest opinion...and again, this was evident.

We had a great experience with Pete with our purchase. He really made the buy of our home very easy; always there for advice, always answering our million questions at different hours of the day! Also, Pete is a well-known realtor in the city, but he always managed to make sure we felt just as important as his other clients, which is very appreciated and not over-looked! :)

Pete, we can't say enough about you. Consider us life-long clients. :)

reviews.name: Lily MacKinnon
reviews.text:
We were extremely happy with the way Pete handled the sale of our home - he was professional, knowledgable, and very easy to work with. Most importantly, he was successful in selling our condo within a very short time frame at a price we were very happy with. He was always available to answer our many questions and went out of his way to make the process smooth and painless for us.

Pete's hard work was instrumental in securing the successful sale of our condo and we would happily recommend him to any friend or family member looking to buy or sell their home.

reviews.name: Neil Saxon
reviews.text: Pete is very friendly and easy to get along which made for an excellent buying experience. He provides no-pressure service but acts quickly on your behalf when needed. Pete is trustworthy and very knowledgeable. We would use Pete again for future real estate transactions. Thanks for your help!

reviews.name: Lance Brown
reviews.text: I’ve been a colleague of Pete’s for several years now and he’s a valuable member of the Vancouver real estate community. I always look forward to working with him.

reviews.name: Ahmed Ismail
reviews.text: Pete Shpak is the man! Top class service top to bottom. Great knowledge of the market, and a shrewd negotiator. Didn't know him before I bought my second condo, now I'm happy to call him a close friend.  He did that great of a job!

reviews.name: Steve Grover
reviews.text:
Honest, knowledgeable, respectful.

We were looking to get into the market for a couple of years. Pete took the time needed to break down all of our options, as well showed immense patience while we viewed multiple properties spanning months of back and forth questions. I'm sure other realtors would have shown frustration, whereas Pete stood by all of our decisions.
I can honestly say that we would not be living in our new home today if it were not for Pete's understanding, caring, and depth of knowledge in the Vancouver Market, as well as his dedication to work with us.
Always available to answer questions with lightning quick responses, we will forever be grateful, and Pete has made a lifelong client.

reviews.name: Taylor Hill
reviews.text: Pete is the BEST! I could not have asked for a better first-time home buying experience!

reviews.name: Eileen Wilson
reviews.text: Pete helped us sell our most recent townhouse in less than a week. Not only did he show an extremely high level of knowledge and know how, he gave us full confidence that we made the right decision on who we chose to sell our home.  We'd highly recommend Pete to not only get the job done, but do it better than well.  He was GREAT!

reviews.name: Lexie Evers
reviews.text: Pete was fantastic to work with! We got along very well and he was always available to answer our questions. He made the process so simple and stress free.

reviews.name: John McKeown
reviews.text:
I found Pete Shpak after exhaustive online research and comparison with other agents.
I needed to sell my home in Vancouver and as I now live and work in California I needed to find someone I could trust to care care of every little detail.
I'm impatient, extremely busy and a perfectionist - for some people a nightmare combination!
Pete was professional and reassuring from the get go.
He answered all my questions and frequently I found that when I had a sudden question that I thought could cause a problem or delay in the listing Pete had anticipated the situation and had solutions.
Pete sold my home really fast and for a price I was very happy with.
I really let Pete take care of the whole process. I never had to go to Vancouver, in fact I never even met Pete!
All our communication was by phone and email which was perfect for me.
I have bought and sold many homes over the years and this was by far the least painful experience I have had - I would go so far as to say it was a pleasure.
I am recommending Pete to all my friends and associates in Vancouver without any reservations at all.

reviews.name: Kevin Reierson
reviews.text: We couldn’t be happier with our decision to choose Pete as our realtor for both our sell and purchase of our new home. After having experiences with a wide range of realtors, we entered with some reservations. Right from our first encounter with Pete, his personable nature created a comfortable and inviting atmosphere for us to feel like we could speak honestly about any concerns or hesitations. Pete was upfront and honest, always giving us different choices and solutions for every decision along the way – without the feeling of being pressured one way or the other. Throughout the process, we were amazed with Pete’s excellent communication – there were never any mixed messages, and everything was clearly conveyed. He was confidently able to address all our questions, was very knowledgeable, and had a contact person for every profession we needed, which made both the buy and sell procedure feel effortless. His dedication made us feel like we were his only clients, when we know he was juggling multiple clients – Pete’s time management is much to be envied! Pete demonstrates the perfect balance between professional diligence and easygoing flexibility. And we have to also mention how thoughtful Pete is, as he would frequently ask how our elderly dog was doing throughout the stress of the move. He has certainly raised the bar on the standards of realtors and we would confidently recommend Pete to anyone looking for a realtor.

reviews.name: Paul Friesen
reviews.text: As a licensed professional home inspector, I work with realtors on a daily basis. I can honestly say that Pete Shpak is one of the most thorough, knowledgeable, and personable realtors I’ve met in the industry. He goes above and beyond for his clients and has raised the bar in the real estate industry. He ensures his clients have home inspections to make an informed decision. He cares about each home’s deficiencies and works hard to have them rectified. He stands head and shoulders above the competition, which speaks to his success.

reviews.name: Marlene Bishop
reviews.text: Pretty good experience.

reviews.name: Jennifer Ruddick
reviews.text:
I worked with Pete to purchase my first apartment in Vancouver, which can be quite a daunting task these days. From the beginning, I was extremely impressed at how knowledgeable Pete was about each area that I was interested in and in the different apartment buildings in each of those areas. For example, when looking at apartments that were not new builds, Pete was very versed in the type of repairs/maintenance required on certain types of buildings that would eventually show up as part of strata assessments in the future. Throughout the process, Pete provided informed and thoughtful advice and genuinely had my best interest in mind. I ended up purchasing an apartment that I absolutely love and am enjoying sitting back and watching how great of an investment it was. Pete is professional, knowledgeable and, most importantly, trustworthy and I would whole-heartedly recommend him to anyone who is about to embark on the process of purchasing a new home in Vancouver.

-Jennifer Ruddick

reviews.name: Brittany Ansell
reviews.text: Pete was amazing throughout the whole process of buying my first home!  At the beginning, we communicated by email and he always responded really quickly and had lots of helpful information.  There was a lot I didn't know going into this but Pete knew it all and I completely trusted him.  When I was ready to start looking, he put together an afternoon of places, saving the best for last.  I fell in a love with a great little condo in the Lower Lonsdale area of North Vancouver.  It was a little out of my price range but Pete negotiated me a great deal, I couldn't really believe it when they accepted haha.  He hooked me up with mortgage people and even made sure I knew about the insurance I needed and gave some suggestions.  Even now, after I've moved in, he's still helping me out with some questions here and there.  Pete goes above and beyond and I would recommend him to anyone!

reviews.name: Alexandra Ballantyne
reviews.text:
I found Pete online and sent him an initial email explaining my situation. I was moving to Vancouver from the Northwest Territories and had a very short timeframe to find a place and close the deal. I had very tight search parameters in terms of location and was picky about the type of condos I was willing to look at.

From the first email I was impressed with Pete's level of professionalism. He answered emails and phone calls promptly and was an excellent problem solver. He educated me about aspects of real estate that I hadn't realized I needed to know about. He is a gifted negotiator, committed to customer service and very knowledgeable about the Kitsilano market.

Perhaps more importantly, Pete is very easy to work with. I came down for a three day weekend where we had over 20 showings. Pete made the entire process so much fun. There was zero pressure. He was completely committed to finding me the perfect place. I would highly recommend Pete to anyone who is looking for a realtor. He is fantastic!

reviews.name: Peyvand Padidar
reviews.text: We are extremely happy to have been introduced to Pete. His dedication, knowledge of the market and positive attitude got us the house we were looking for. Thank you Pete!

reviews.name: Alan Zheng
reviews.text: Pete helped me purchased my first home in downtown Vancouver, I've met a couple of realtors in the past, I can say that Pete is not your typical "realtor". He's patient, and he doesn't tell you what to do, he rather states pros and cons of the property, so you can weigh them base on your priorities, and unlike certain realtors out there, he never pushes me to just get the transaction done. In addition, Pete has a lot of connections which will make this daunting process as smooth as it can be. He even gone out of his way and helped me sorting out small problems after the deal was done. In short, I chose Pete based on the reviews I saw on the internet, I now believe they were genuine. If you are looking for a realtor who's gonna help you make the "right" purchase, use Pete!

reviews.name: Hailey Devitt
reviews.text: I have and will continue to recommend Pete to anyone looking to buy or sell! As a first time home buyer I had the usual questions, concerns and nerves but Pete was able to answer all my questions and inform me on things that I didn’t know I should be asking! I couldn’t be happier in my new place and look forward to hopefully working with Pete again in the near future.

reviews.name: Brenda Tunke
reviews.text: We are so impressed with Pete.  Anyone that is seeking a real estate professional should be using Pete. He is knowledgeable and very responsive. I know that our family will be using Pete for all our future real estate transaction needs.

reviews.name: Kate Richmond
reviews.text:
Writing under my wife's account as mine is not connecting for some reason. We worked with Pete to sell our condo in Burnaby in June earlier this year. To be perfectly honest, I have worked with and know enough realtors to know just how unprofessional and self-serving some can be - to the point that I have sold my own real estate in a few cases. Pete is the exact opposite of this negative generalization (sorry realtors). I found Pete after looking through the reviews on a dozen or so and contacted him for an initial meeting along with one other realtor. I was impressed. His expertise in the market, his ability to guide us through the decision process and advise as a well-versed savvy real estate professional was second to none. With Pete, we sold our condo within 6 days of hitting the market and (after 300+ ppl viewed the property through two showings and a number of private appointments) after reviewing six competing offers I'm confident we received top dollar in record timing with minimal carrying costs. If you're looking to work with a true real estate professional, dial Pete.
Shaun and Kate Richmond

reviews.name: Christine Tschetter
reviews.text: Jonathan and I had been going to open houses for a couple of months on the weekends, looking at our options but not committed to the search. We were "pitched" by nearly every realtor we met, and were completely unimpressed by most and not very motivated by others.  After going to see one of Pete's listings, he asked if we wanted to go for a drink and talk about his services. A few drinks later, Pete had an idea of what we were looking for and we had our first date lined up for Saturday afternoon to look at a long list of possible new homes. We were immediately impressed with Pete's knowledge of the market and individual buildings in our desired neighbourhoods, not only the ones we were going to see, but every building we asked about on the way as well. Pete kept the whole process low pressure, from our timeline, our relationship with him, and all of our purchasing decisions. He encouraged us to view a wide variety of types of buildings, outside of our Yaletown bubble, to gain a better understanding of what was out there and what we truly wanted. He took the time to bring us to wood frame walkups, townhouses in False Creek, new builds, presales and everything in between. Even though we ended up right across the street from our previous place, the process Pete took us through really helped us realize what was important to us all along (neighbourhood) and things we hadn't yet realized we couldn't live without (AC). We found our new home on that first Saturday, but Pete was patient with us as we looked around for a couple more weeks. Once we made our decision Pete helped us through the entire process, easing our fears and giving tips all along the way and negotiated a great price. He stuck with us through the inspection and walkthrough and we even went out to dinner to celebrate the day we moved in. Pete wowed us with his generosity and knowledge and we couldn't have done it without him.

reviews.name: GJ Stoner
reviews.text:
My partner and I worked with Pete Shpak over the course of many months to finally secure our home in downtown Vancouver.  He was courteous, timely, accommodating and most importantly very effective in his work.  He worked tirelessly to keep properties of interest in front of us.  When we finally settled on our home at Meccanica he was involved every step of the way without being overbearing in the least.

Not only did he help us find the right place for us he was there supporting us on the various walk throughs, understanding strata rules, etc. well after he had completed his part of the sale...honestly just about any question we had he was willing to find the answer including helping us secure a very tight window for move in.

I have bought and sold numerous homes over many years and I can honestly say Pete has been one of the best realtors I've dealt with.  I'm so impressed I have no issue having Pete represent our company when we have employees considering a move to Vancouver.

He stands above the rest!

title: Mike Stewart Personal Vancouver Real Estate Corporation
address: 1286 Homer St #400, Vancouver, BC V6B 2Y5, Canada

reviews.name: Janek Kuchmistrz
reviews.text:
We would recommend anyone selling in Vancouver to seriously consider using Mike Stewart as their realtor. He brings to his clients many years of solid experience in the Vancouver real estate market, and Mike has an intuitive sense of how to maximize the potential appeal of a home for as many buyers as possible.

Crucially, Mike is a very skilled and strategic negotiator, knowing exactly how to guide you as the seller through negotiations, so that you end up with the most favourable outcome possible. Negotiating a sale is definitely Mike's strong suit, and his skill helped us greatly with our recent townhouse sale in the West End of Vancouver.

Thanks Mike!

Janek and Israel

reviews.name: fred obrien
reviews.text:
My spouse and I first met Mike over 8 years ago, when we purchased our first home  in the Vancouver market

At that time, we really appreciated his patience and expertise.  His insight was extremely important to us.

We recently called on Mike to be our agent of choice for  the sale of our home. Once again, Mike  exceeded our expectations.

During the entire sale process, we were fully informed. Mike was responsive to our questions/ needs.

We look forward to working with Mike and his Team again.

Fred and Terry

reviews.name: fatima karmali
reviews.text: We have completed multiple transactions with Mike Stewart, and he has always made us feel very comfortable with a complex process, and especially during a pandemic. He is professional, experienced, knowledgeable, very responsive to enquiries and always willing to provide support. His team provides impeccable service (shout out to Marco). He helped us set expectations for the sale of our property in a pandemic, and helped us speedily negotiate a multiple offer situation on the property we purchased. All in all, a smooth process which we appreciated.

reviews.name: Natalia Fil
reviews.text: Mike helped our family with multiple real estate transactions and he proved to be a very knowledgeable professional with unparalleled working ethics. Real estate market is a very tricky thing in Vancouver and you want to have a right person by your side to help you to navigate through the process. I would highly recommend Mike to friends, family and beyond!

reviews.name: Joel Stanley Robertson
reviews.text: Excellent realtor! I work with many in my financial planning practice and Mike is whom I trust with my personal business. High level of expertise, great communications skills, and has an integrity and dependability that is unmatched. I am very fortunate to have Mike on my side.

reviews.name: Paula Liza Bartis
reviews.text: Mike helped us buy our dream home and we couldn’t have been happier to have him as our realtor. He was super professional, provided great insight and feedback to any questions we had, and helped us navigate the whole process. We felt confident and happy to have Mike as our realtor. Highly recommend Mike to everyone who is buying or selling a home!

reviews.name: Lant Lutterodt
reviews.text: Mike helped me purchase a condo in Vancouver's Fairview neighborhood and the experience was fantastic! He was helpful, polite, attentive, and extremely knowledgeable about properties in Vancouver. He helped me avoid bad buildings and steered high quality condos that were just right for me. Thanks again Mike!

reviews.name: trinity2861
reviews.text: Mike Stewart was a pleasure to work with and provide expertise in a field we had little knowledge of. He is prompt and pays attention to detail. Even after the completion he was willing to help in any way he could. I would strongly recommend him.

reviews.name: Christian Dy
reviews.text: Mike was incredible at keeping me informed every step of the buying experience. His analysis was invaluable for pricing on the sell side as well.

reviews.name: austin m
reviews.text: We worked with Mike during both the purchase and sale of our Main Street apartment - both excellent experiences.  Mike is extremely professional and highly knowledgable of the Vancouver real estate market.  Furthermore, he is always available when you need to get ahold of him, and takes every step necessary to ensure that the client is taken care of.  I would absolutely recommend working with Mike.

reviews.name: Luis Boullosa
reviews.text:
Mike is an outstanding realtor.
He provided me with all the tools for me to make the best possible decision. Always checking in, being patient, and supporting me every step of the way.

Thanks to Mike, I found exactly the place that I was looking for, and I couldn't be happier with my purchase.

reviews.name: Justin Smith
reviews.text: Michael has always been a fantastic resource , especially for what's happening in the presale market, and I am happy to recommend his services.

reviews.name: Michelle V
reviews.text: Mike just got my husband and I into our first home and was a pleasure to deal with. Friendly, courteous, and always prompt with answers. Even after completing the purchase, Mike is available to help which I really appreciate being a first time home buyer! Highly recommend.

reviews.name: Teresa Abbruzzese
reviews.text: It was great working with Mike.  He was very professional and focused on what I wanted as a client.  Thanks Mike!

reviews.name: Theresa Webber
reviews.text: Mike is communicative, patient and courteous. I really appreciate the time and energy he put into the sale of my home. I especially appreciate how accessible he was for my many questions. Thank you, Mike.

reviews.name: Tristan Jenkin
reviews.text:
Mike is a true professional.  We could not have asked for more from him and his team. We had a challenging property to sell but Mike made sure it was marketed optimally and we ended up getting top dollar during a difficult time.
Highly recommend his services to anyone.

reviews.name: Sheilen Shefali Raja
reviews.text: We recently used Mike to sell our unit in Vancouver and he was very helpful. Mike dealt with the tenant and the property management company in a very timely manner and we were able to sell out unit in a few weeks. What we thought was a complicated process Mike handled it professsionaly. Thank You

reviews.name: Aaron Madaisky
reviews.text:
It was awesome to work with Mike. He was able to get us an amazing result during uncertain times. He took care of all of our needs and walked us through the process so that there were no worries on our end.

We will definitely be using Mike again.

reviews.name: Kathryn Hallanzy
reviews.text: Mike is great.  He made the experience of buying and selling as stress-free as possible with his infectious enthusiasm, and endless patience.  He also gets back to you VERY promptly with every question you may have -  before, during and even after closing the purchase.  He's also extremely knowledgeable about the real estate market, and won't sugar-coat things for you.  All in all, I'd thoroughly recommend him.

reviews.name: Arundip Asaduzzaman
reviews.text: Mike is an excellent realtor. My wife and I have purchased a condo, and Mike was there to guide us every step of the way. In addition to being patient and highly responsive throughout the process, we benefited from Mike's extensive knowledge base about the Vancouver market. We liked the fact that Mike is a "straight shooter", and says it as it is. If a building or area has problems, Mike does not hesitate in sharing that info. There were a few complexities in our buying process, and Mike was accommodating in this regard, being able to re-evaluate and re-start on short notice. I should also mention that Mike's assistant, Amy, is amazing. She was quickly able to generate efficient itineraries for showings, which was highly appreciated in light of our difficult schedule. I would recommend Mike 100%, and hopefully will work with him again!

reviews.name: Roxanne Kingsbury
reviews.text: Mike Stewart in short is an exceptional Real Estate professional.  His knowledge of the market, and connections in the new development world is an advantage I think any buyer or seller needs to embrace.  His presence online is hard to beat and something we felt was very impressive and a resource not to be overlooked.  From start to finish in the real estate process...Mike Stewart and his team are plus 5 star++

reviews.name: J Galpin
reviews.text:
I had the pleasure of working with Mike for a purchase in November of 2019. He is a successful realtor, but that never reduced the attention he paid to my family and me. For our part, we always found it easy to get in touch with Mike if we had questions and concerns. Our purchase had some complexities, but Mike helped us navigate through them with ease.

I would highly recommend Mike. The Vancouver market is complex, so it’s good to have a true professional at your side.

reviews.name: Terry Moore
reviews.text: Mike is the go to guy.  He knows the market like no other.   Very patient with potential buyers.    He will make sure that all your needs and concerns are addressed.   He is a wealth of knowledge.   Can't recommend him enough!

reviews.name: John Maxon (Wolf Pack Home Inspection)
reviews.text: Great team of professionals.

reviews.name: Dw Dw
reviews.text: I had the pleasure to work with Mike to find my ‘dream home ‘. It’s so great to have him on your side to guide you through all the formalities and obstacles along the way. Outstanding! Just amazing! Thank you Mike!!!

reviews.name: Martin Gagnon
reviews.text: Mike Stewart is a real professional. He responded promptly to any concern we had. Mike was detail oriented and he helped explaining the selling process of our condo downtown. We needed help to find an  electrician and helped us to find one in minutes. I would recommend him without hesitation.

reviews.name: iRon lMoNKleY
reviews.text: His e-mails are informative, but they seem to be marketing schemes aimed at a select few only. I've responded with "I'm interested" to each property that I've been interested in for about a year. I have never received a reply back to follow up.

reviews.name: Kristen Walmsley
reviews.text: Mike Stewart helped me buy a condo with my ex, sell that when we split up and buy another condo for myself.  My experience was very positive.  I think Mike was knowledgeable about the market and helped me along the way with each transaction.  Buying a condo on my own was a challenge but Mike was there for me answering questions, checking out properties with me, getting the strata minutes to me quickly and helping me with all the paperwork and details.  His team was helpful as I do not own a car.  They picked me up and drove me around when I needed to deliver cheques on a timely basis. I feel quite happy about  my experience with Mike and his team and would use them again; although I hope I don't have to.

reviews.name: Flo Weller
reviews.text: Mike Stewart helped my brother and I purchase pre-sale condos in downtown Vancouver and he was fantastic throughout the entire process. We strongly recommend Mike to help you purchase a pre-sale or an existing property in the Vancouver area! It was a wonderful experience and we will definitely work with him again. Absolutely amazing!!!!!

reviews.name: K Lin
reviews.text: Worst and shadiest realtor in town. Do your research. This guy is a right wing nut job and hands his clients over to his assistants. When you hire him, you get 0 personal touch.

reviews.name: Sean CH
reviews.text:
For anyone looking for a realtor with an ethical standard, Mike Stewart would not be the one to go to.

Recently in the 2019 Vancouver Real Estate Investment Summit, Mike was supposed to provide commentary on factors he thinks would influence the real estate market. However, he took a nasty turn when he decided to engage in a diatribe against the Chinese government as an argument for why he believed the real estate market in Vancouver would rebound. He made extremely ignorant, rude and aggressive comments on subjects he not only is not qualified to talk about, but which were entirely out of place at such a forum. He portrayed himself as a mercenary who relishes in the prospect of misfortune (conflict in Hong Kong) for achieving his own economic gain of having increased buyers in Vancouver's real estate. Both in an business and personal context, I would not want to associate with this individual.

reviews.name: Ruzeen Rezvie
reviews.text: Thanks for the BC realtor commission cal on your website.

reviews.name: shawn sanderson
reviews.text: There are many great things to say about Mike but I can think of a few that really stand out.   Mike makes the buying experience stress free even in a crazy market like Vancouver. He is knowledgable and well respected by other agents. When it comes time to make the offer, Mike provides the necessary information and guidance while making sure all along that you are comfortable with your offer and decision. I felt that I was in good hands!

reviews.name: Kathryn Huang
reviews.text: Mike is extremely knowledgeable and experienced. I met him in one of UBC's programs, where he had been invited as a speaker. I was very impressed with him when he sold my house as he provided me with tons of real estate market news and advice and many useful tools on his website. It is a pleasure to work with Mike since he can take care everything for me! I would highly recommend Mike to people looking to buy or sell a house in Vancouver.

reviews.name: Raymond Tam
reviews.text: I've worked with Mike Steward on multiple real estate deals. He has been quick to respond to my queries and action on problems we faced. I can count on Mike to turn documents around quickly.

reviews.name: Karren Stewart
reviews.text: Mike Stewart is a top-notch realtor that I've worked with for over 10 years. We have sold and bought many properties with him and I've always been extremely satisfied with his integrity and commitment to service and great results. We strongly recommend him to everyone here and we due to all of our friends on a consistent regular basis. Mike is great!

reviews.name: Sukhmani Dhaliwal
reviews.text:
My husband and I had an excellent experience with Mike. He was patient and polite and would promptly reply to each and every query we had. Not only did we find our dream home but he made the process so simple!

If you're looking for a knowledgeable and personable realtor, Mike is your guy.

reviews.name: Sat Oberoi
reviews.text:
My wife and I have been working with Mike for almost 2 years and only just purchased our first place through him.  He has been incredibly patient and more importantly, honest throughout the entire process.

reviews.name: chris scobie
reviews.text:
Full disclosure, I’m a realtor. I’ve only been one for a couple of years, and haven’t benefited from this crazy market. I have known Mike for a lot longer than I’ve been a realtor.

I’ve read about Mike in the news lately. I think what is being lost is why he did what he did. Was it the right thing to do…maybe not, but he was trying to help his clients and that’s why he has been successful as a realtor. There is nothing illegal about what Mike did, it just doesn’t sit right with some. The way the government rammed this tax through also doesn’t sit right.  This government has been doing nothing for a very long time, and finally felt enough heat, close enough to re-election time, that they decided to take some action…way too late to make any difference for Vancouverites. Change the rules and have them take effect quickly, that’s not really a problem, but penalizing people who bought without these rules is not right. Trust me, I think there should have been way more regulations on foreign buyers, a long time ago. Mike would probably agree with me, because, despite what lots of people have been saying, he’s a decent ethical guy who does not like it that home ownership in Vancouver is out of reach for many. We both have kids, and have talked about it in that context.
How about complaining that the Feds and the Quebec government are letting immigrant investors enter through Quebec and come to Vancouver. What’s the point of closing that program everywhere in Canada except for Quebec. How about the banks, facilitating movement of money from China, that they know is illegal. As for affordability, the City of Vancouver is not as innocent as the Mayor would have you believe either. Ridiculous wait times for permits, high cost to developers…these are things that get passed on to homebuyers, not to mention significant increases to the property tax base when a development is occupied….more of a money grab.

I’ve known Mike for years, and always found him to be knowledgeable, prompt with information, honest and straightforward. He is a professional, ethical, and very hard working guy. He’s also a good decent guy, and I don’t buy any of the ‘caring only about his wallet” or that he doesn’t care about Vancouver or affordability business, either.

The Media puts out flashy headlines, and benefits when those reading them don’t bother to dig into the issues any deeper. Dig a little!

reviews.name: Shawn Murphy
reviews.text: Mike Stewart has consistently proved that dedication to his clients, hard work, and extensive product knowledge are what you should be looking for in a real estate professional.  I recommend his services completely.

reviews.name: Erica Commons
reviews.text: I hired Mike to represent me while purchasing a pre-sale condo in Vancouver. When notices about a homeowner’s walkthrough from the developer weren’t sent to me (email address typo), the developer’s representative went ahead with the inspection without me. Mike was cc’ed on these emails and never noticed the issue or voiced concern when we didn’t show up for the walkthrough. When I found out about the missed walkthrough through my lawyer, I asked Mike over email to help me resolve this issue by getting another walkthrough scheduled. He called me to talk to me about the situation and told me he would follow up with the developer and would get back to me. He never contacted me again. I worked with the developer directly and had another walkthrough scheduled. The deal closed, I moved into my new place, and I still have never heard back from him nor have I received any congratulations from him—even though he has received payment from the developer for being my realtor. I am disappointed in his handling of this situation, and his support as my realtor overall. When I go to sell my property I will be looking for a different realtor to represent me.

reviews.name: Corey M
reviews.text: I subscribed to Mike Stewart's VIP Pre-construction email list thinking that I was going to get informed on any pre-sales buildings.  My experience was terrible.  He called me every day and left messages until I finally picked up.  When he realized that I was already working with another realtor, he abruptly ended the conversation and hung up.  Obviously this guy is only interested in getting business from people and making money!!   I could have recommended him to a family member or friend but now I definitely won't.
