She was quick to answer all our questions in the process of buying for the first time and made us feel super comfortable with our first purchase :) Thanks a million Jenna!

reviews.name: Jen Hopp
reviews.text: We cannot recommend Jenna more highly for her exceptional work as our realtor. She is extremely professional, genuine, dedicated and committed to finding the best fit for her clients. Her marketing is beautiful as well, and really showcased our home in the best light possible. We bought and sold a house with Jenna through  the  COVID pandemic, and even with the unique challenges this time brought, Jenna listed and sold our townhouse within a week. We felt so confident with Jenna and could not be happier with the results she generated for us. Go with Jenna, you won’t be disappointed! Thank you for everything.

reviews.name: Nadine Goodgrove
reviews.text: Jenna was incredibly professional, knowledgeable and extremely supportive to us throughout the entire process; from listing to selling!  Her dedication to  dealing with the unique circumstances during the COVID-19 pandemic were exceptional, through every single showing!  She was always available to answer questions and reassure us as she assisted us to navigate through the process.  We would highly recommend her to any of our friends and family.

reviews.name: Matthew Zook
reviews.text: We worked with Jenna to find and close on a Squamish townhome in Aug 2020. We are the typical young growing family currently living in Vancouver. Looking for more space, better value, and to be closer to Whistler on the weekends. Jenna was fantastic. She's friendly, personable and always quick to get back of us, if not one step ahead of us. She helped us understand Squamish's real estate, neighbourhoods and schools. And she seemed to have great relationships with the other realtors as well as both the big and small developers. Made a huge difference in our ability to confidently find and quickly close on our new Townhouse. Highly recommend Jenna. :-)

reviews.name: Stephanie Weirich Clark
reviews.text:
Working with Jenna to purchase our home in Squamish was an absolute pleasure. When you're in a market like this, where real estate is very sought after, and you often have competing offers, you want to be working with a realtor who knows what they are doing.

Ours was not an easy purchase, with tight timelines, offers falling through on the place we were selling, and back up offers on the place we were buying; Jenna pulled all the stops to make sure we would be able to close the deal on our dream home.

Jenna is well researched and knows the space of real estate well. I would highly recommend working with her if you are in the market of selling or buying your home.

reviews.name: Amanda Palmer
reviews.text:
Getting into the real estate market can be so daunting! My husband and I were first time homebuyers, and Jenna was our rock throughout the entire process. She was always available to discuss our concerns, and kept a lookout for properties she knew would interest us. She's the reason we found our condo - as it was freshly on the market when she found it and booked a tour!
We actually moved during the pandemic, and although it was a challenging time, Jenna practiced safe distancing during our key handoff, and very thoughtfully brought us lunch while we were unpacking.
I can't recommend Jenna more highly. She's professional, realistic, forward thinking, and a joy to be around!

reviews.name: Jason Green
reviews.text: We recently made a purchase with Jenna and it was a fantastic experience! She’s very down to earth, approachable and hard working. She was on the ball with communication and patient with all our many questions. We couldn’t have picked a better realtor to represent us and we are looking forward to using her services in the future!!!!

reviews.name: Kelly Jackson
reviews.text: Knowledgeable and fun to work with:) Jenna knows the market! She works hard and has amazing attention to detail. I highly recommend Jenna if you’re looking to buy or sell in Squamish.

reviews.name: Monica Skeete
reviews.text:
Jenna is friendly, hard working, knowledgeable and a pleasure to work with!  She goes the extra mile to make sure everything is the best it can be. She is intuitive to her clients needs and stays  true to her word throughout!
I’d highly recommend her!

reviews.name: Randelle Davis
reviews.text: Jenna has her pulse on market trends in the Sea to Sky corridor and Vancouver area.  She has an eye for detail and really helps envision the potential your home can be.  Jenna has guided us smoothly through the process of selling our home in Squamish, BC.  She responds promptly to all of our questions and concerns.  Her big smile, magnetic personality and confidence in the field really put you at ease when making this life-changing decision of listing or buying a home.

reviews.name: Marlene Bairos
reviews.text: As a first-time buyer, I had a great experience working with Jenna. She was quick to respond to any and all my questions during the entire process. She was always willing to go the extra mile and her detailed insights and knowledge of the area were invaluable in helping me in my buying decision. I would absolutely recommend her and will definitely use her again in the future!

reviews.name: jasmin labree
reviews.text: Jenna has been amazing! She has gone above and beyond for us. She has been very quick to respond to all of our questions, and is very knowledgeable and motivated. I highly recommend Jenna and would definitely use her again in the future!

reviews.name: Majid Hassanshahi
reviews.text:
Jenna took time in getting to know our situation well & understanding exactly what we were looking for. She was super pro-active by reaching out to other agents and finding out about possible future listings that matched our criteria - we were the first to know about those listings & even viewed a property weeks before it got listed. At the end, she guided us into multiple suitable options - one of which we had never thought of & that property ended up being our purchase. We are so thankful that she led us to our dream home – without her, it wouldn’t have happened!

Also, she demonstrated excellent price negotiation skills & got us 7% below asking without any counter offers (the deal was done in 24 hours).

THANKS Jenna!

Majid & Zohreh

reviews.name: Leah Turner
reviews.text: Jenna is excellent! So appreciated her dedication and hard work to sell our house! She is knowledgeable, personable, professional, and super easy to work with. Highly recommend her for your real estate needs.

reviews.text: This was our first time buying a home and Jenna exceeded all of our expectations. It was a stress free experience and she went above and beyond to meet all our needs. We would defiantly use her again!

reviews.text: Jenna has impressed us time and time again with her attention to detail, motivation, quick responses and knowledge of Real Estate. As a first-time home buyer, Jenna couldn’t have made the experience any easier and exciting. Highly recommend giving her a call.

reviews.text: Jenna has been amazing, very excited to sell our home. Open house was a great success her attention to detail has been a inspiration, very smart and helpful. Her motivation will I’m sure get our house sold.

reviews.text: Jenna is awesome, we are working with her on a Squamish property. She listened very well to our needs, expectations and budget, she is attentive and patient, we’re looking forward to purchasing with Jenna, I’d highly recommend her!

title: Les Twarog RE/MAX Crest Realty

reviews.name: Peter Handler
reviews.text:
My wife and I have known Les Twarog for some time. We currently are clients of his renting one of his properties in Mexico. We can say with all sincerity that he is caring, concerned, compassionate, detail conscious and responsive. His salient character component is his straightforwardness. Les is a "straight shooter"--he, as they say, "walks the talk" and provides his clients expectations which become their experiences. His success in the real estate business is due, no doubt, to this character trait. Nowadays, the three words which, unfortunately, have us baffled, deception, duplicity and dissembling, are not in Les' vocabulary. You know you have the right guy when you ask yourself:
"Would you buy a used car from Les Twarog?" The answer is, unequivocally, yes.

reviews.text: Known les for years.  This guys a joke. No wonder his whole team come and gone over and over again. Pay up les. Take your fake team photo off.  You got nothing, literally.... wait nvm you still got sonja.... but in time ..... wuh-PSSSH!

reviews.name: Jacqui Mccarter
reviews.text: I was stuck in the real estate world in Vancouver. Looking through 100s 100s of real estate agents not knowing who I should actually hire to help buy and sell my properties. A friend had mention Les and Stephanie Twarog and that was some of the best adivce I have ever received. I called Les and Stephanie and told them that I was interested in buying a apartment in a certain building but there were no apartments for sale (yet) in the building I was interested in. Les and Stephanie took it upon themselves to write out flyers along with the price we discussed and flyered the apartments in the building I was interested in and low and behold an apartment owner did want to sell their apartment. Les and Stephanie took care Of the whole entire transaction. They made the process go extremely easy and stress free. They are both very professional and know exactly what they are doing. Since then I have hired them for a few more deals and with out a doubt they have surpassed my expectations. I love doing business with them both and would never turn to another real estate agent again.

reviews.text: We were looking online for a very particular condo in Yaletown for a while but didn't know who to pick to help us as there are so many Real Estate Agents out there. title: Paul Eviston Vancouver Realtor
address: 5487 West Blvd #3, Vancouver, BC V6M 3W5, Canada

reviews.name: LINDA PENROSE
reviews.text: Paul Eviston found me a house In East Vancouver in 2005. It served my family well for 16 years and left us with many good memories. However it was now time to sell so I contacted Paul and eight days later I accepted an offer. Working with Paul was a stress-free experience. I had multiple ways to contact him from my home in the Okanogan and felt that I could do this at any point whether I had a big question or just needed  a little reassurance. He was always there and very receptive. Paul  was totally professional and really knows the housing market. I put my faith in him and it paid off. I would not hesitate to recommend him to anyone who is looking to sell a property in the Vancouver area. Thank you,  Paul.

reviews.name: Alex Gondek
reviews.text: Edward and the rest of Team Eviston were excellent guides in my search for an apartment in Greater Vancouver. I appreciated Edward's patience and advice as I changed my search criteria over the past year while I figured out exactly what I was looking for. His deep knowledge of the market and the due diligence he did on the properties we saw was very helpful. I am very happy with the outcome and will be sure to contact Edward and the team for my future real estate needs.

reviews.name: Ellie Fox
reviews.text: I met with Edward Evison by chance and it was a pure luck!  I am so grateful for all his hard work to secure me the two purchases in such a competitive market!  Edward is  thorough, professional and great to work with. He was very patient with me and  was honest and forthright- no games. Very professional and truly a great experience.

reviews.name: Hilary Kovacs
reviews.text:
We initially talked to Paul when our first daughter was born regarding the sale of our Vancouver home. We decided to stay longer, but he still kept in touch, at which point we could really tell he was in it for the long game.

After finding out our family was growing by 2 more, we called Paul right away. In selling our place, he told us exactly how things were going to play out, how many offers we could expect, and what our home could go for. He was exactly right, and his pulse on the market is undeniable. His whole team supported us through the entire process!

We felt that Haydn and Paul really got what we were after in our new home search, and understood our desire for a heritage home with a great layout in a walkable neighbourhood. They took us to several houses, and spent a lot of time with us. Obviously buying in the Vancouver market is extremely stressful, and even when our emotions got the best of us, Haydn and Paul were calm and steady, telling us we would end up with a beautiful home, which we did! We were in a multiple offer situation, and we were still able to win without reaching our max budget.

The entire process, we truly felt that Haydn and Paul were excited for us, wanted a nice house for us as badly as we did, and told us when to run away from places. We put 100% trust in them, and they did not let us down.

reviews.name: Michelle T
reviews.text: We weren't actively in the market/looking to purchase a home but an ideal situation came up for our recent circumstances and we needed a realtor at the last minute to help us put in an offer. Edward Eviston acted fast and got us moving forward to purchasing our first home. Through the whole process he has been a top-notch professional with great referrals. He is very responsive and prompt with his communication which helped put our minds at ease. Because this was our first time purchasing a home, we had no idea what to do. He helped walk us through the process and made us feel very comfortable to ask anything even if we felt it was a silly question. Beyond having a positive and great experience with using Edward as our realtor, he is very personable and genuinely a nice guy. Good people are hard to find and we would not hesitate to use him again or recommend him to others.

reviews.name: DFM1129
reviews.text: We have a heritage house, and chose Paul and his team because of their expertise in the Vancouver market. This has been a fantastic experience for us, and we highly recommend them for help in buying or selling your home. Selling your house can be a bit of a roller coaster ride. Thanks to Paul’s help, it was very easy!

reviews.name: Victor Hasson
reviews.text:
I have been using Paul as my agent for multiple real estate transactions over the years . It is important for me that my realtor has a deep understanding of the local market . The reason for this is  that in addition to acting as just a sales agent , he is able to give me the professional advice I need as to whether the property will meet my particular investment objectives.
Paul’s experience of 30 years in this market ,with the most transactions of any realtor, puts him in this unique position. His considered opinion is the single most important component of my due diligence performed before purchasing  or selling a property.
Whether buying or selling ,for personal or business purposes , his professionalism and knowledge put him head and shoulders above the rest .
I am very grateful to him for all he has brought to the table as my exclusive agent.
Thanks Paul.

reviews.name: Ray Soden
reviews.text: Being a retired Realtor I certainly know the value of choosing the right Listing Agent to sell our property. From day one Paul was courteous, professional, and totally knowledgeable. Paul and his team came with the right game plan and the property was sold way over asking price in less than a week. Having known Paul for decades, I can see why he and his team are so successful. Highly recommended, Ray and Diane.

reviews.name: Brooke Nesrallah
reviews.text: We had an awesome experience working with Paul, Edward, and the rest of the team! They know their stuff and are always very quick to respond to any requests. Professional, punctual, honest, and fair - Team Eviston has been at the top of this business in Vancouver for an obvious reason!

We worked with Edward to find our first home and he really delivered!

Edward was the third real estate agent we worked with and by the time we met him we were very disillusioned with the market and realtors. We were also  beginning to wonder if we would ever find the right home for our family. Edward was an objective sounding board for us throughout the process. He never had difficulty lining up viewings and he was committed to finding us the right home within our budget. He was professional throughout the process and never made us feel like anything was too much trouble. We really enjoyed working with Edward and he made what is a very stressful process, that much easier. We highly recommend Edward!

reviews.name: Sal Ferreras
reviews.text: Paul and his team provided excellent service for your recent move. He has extensive knowledge of the Vancouver market and his advice about pricing and timing was invaluable. His expertise resulted in a quick sale after the first open house.

reviews.name: Emily Brett
reviews.text: As a first time condo buyer in Vancouver, the process can be stressful and discouraging with multiple offer situations and places going well above list price. Edward was so helpful with my search, he was always there to answer questions and I never felt pressured or rushed to make a decision. I feel like I found the perfect condo in the end!

reviews.name: Al Hermkens
reviews.text: I have had 3 experiences selling homes. Two bad ones, one great one. For no nonsense and get the house sold... Paul and his team are who you want. Very professional, easy to work with and not afraid to tell you how it really is by using all tools available. Particularly in a very slow market. Totally satisfied and highly recommend. Their years of experience in the Vancouver real estate market is worth every cent.

reviews.name: Shawan Das
reviews.text: Paul and Edward are knowledgeable, professional, and diligent. My family and I entrust in them for all of our purchasers. Would highly recommend and without hesitation.

reviews.name: Laszlo Szentirmai
reviews.text: Paul Eviston is a highly experienced and passionate realtor with a team of colleagues with years of experience and diverse expertise. In a changing and challenging market, he was able to help us sell our home and purchase the one we fell in love with in a short time frame. We asked him for help with everything related to the process—from advice about staging, to finishing a few repairs, to cleaning and preparations for our open houses. He hooked us up with excellent professionals in each case; this meant that we could list and sell our house quickly. We appreciate what Paul and his team were able to accomplish and highly recommend them!

reviews.name: Cameron Leslie
reviews.text: Ed and Hayden did a great job. They continue to help after the sale.

reviews.name: Lynn Buller
reviews.text:
We have bought and sold many homes but have to say the experience we had with Paul Eviston was the Best by far. His experience in the Vancouver real estate market is invaluable. He got our house sold for the top possible value in a quickly declining market. He was able to talk us through the offer and show us comparable sales to help us understand. Paul's expertise saved us hundreds of thousands of dollars and we are
very grateful. There are many realtors to choose from but speaking from experience choosing a professional get the job done team like Paul Eviston's could be the difference from many long months of stressful showings and disappointments to a quick top value result like we experienced. Thanks Paul you have a lifelong clients here.

reviews.name: Jenna Hilts
reviews.text: The Eviston team is incredibly knowledgeable on the Vancouver and surrounding market. If you are looking for someone to go the extra mile and have your best interest in mind, I highly recommend them. Edward worked hard to negotiate and find us our perfect home.

title: Sal Toosi Vancouver Real Estate
address: 638 Broughton St #310, Vancouver, BC V6G 3K3, Canada

reviews.name: Nikunj Patel
reviews.text:
Sal is a true professional with best work ethics and always has your best interests at the forefront. We got way more than our asking price and this could only happen with Sal by our side.

We had the assurance and peace of mind knowing that no matter what come up, Sal is going to take care of it and he did it wholeheartedly.

reviews.name: Rohina Arif
reviews.text: Sal is absolutely wonderful to work with! He sold our condo for over asking in less than a week after it was listed and helped us to secure a house in North Shore! His amazing team arranged to do the professional staging and photography for the listing and even offered to paint the condo for free. He showed us many homes all over Greater Vancouver and made buying a house such a breeze in this hot market!  Sal is extremely knowledgeable and professional real estate agent who sincerely cares about his clients. I highly recommend him!

reviews.name: Amir Asghari
reviews.text: I had a very amazing experience buying my first house with Sal. I was quite new to the experience, Sal was very patient with me and he took the time to explain everything and advise me for the right purchase. He's very knowledgable and he doesn't give up until he helps you find what you are looking for. It took me 7 months to find what I was looking for, and Sal stayed patient with me and helped me throughout the way. Sal and his team are very professional and friendly. It feels nice to trust someone like Sal, it will make the whole real estate experience much more smooth. I definitely recommend Sal and his team! Thank you Sal!

reviews.name: Jak Wawrzyniak
reviews.text: Worked with Sal to purchase my (our) first home! Couldn't say more positive things about the experience and echo everything said on his reviews already. You will see his genuine and hard working personality on his social media; and that is exactly the individual you get in-person. No BS and get's the job done. Particularly impressed that his team does almost everything "in-house" from viewing, to inspection, to closing and everything in-between. 10/10.

reviews.name: Pedram Rafie
reviews.text:
Exceptional results in such a short time! I’m impressed.

I hired Sal and his team for selling two of my properties, and I can’t be happier. He treats you like a real friend and he truly cares. One of my properties was occupied by tenants who were very unhappy to learn the fact that I am selling! Sal was so tactful and strategic to handle the situation like a real professional. He ended up selling the property to a buyer he found through his own connections, so we didn’t even have to list it - almost $50,000 over my expectations.

And then the stress level was so high cause I had already bought a new house and was under so much pressure to sell for a certain number! Sal is an amazing negotiator and he was able to not only create multiple offers, but also fought for us to the every last penny, and we really appreciate it. Highly recommend.

reviews.name: Claire Pitcher
reviews.text: I could write a whole encyclopedia on how great Sal was and it still wouldn't capture it all!  He helped my partner and I find a *perfect* property for our first home and he held our hands through every step of the process.  We had a billion questions and were super cautious at various stages and Sal was always really responsive, patient and professional in his answers.  He also was honest about pointing out things he liked/didn't like in various properties we checked out and he helped us wait until we found a great fit before making an offer.  And then he did an amazing job of negotiating (...and helping us not panic during the process, haha.)  I'd absolutely recommend him to anyone & am amazed what a positive experience it was to work with him.  I can't say enough how hesitant we were to enter the Vancouver real estate market, and Sal made it a comfortable and interesting learning experience each step of the way.

reviews.name: Mehri Ziaeenejad
reviews.text:

Sal has extensive knowledge on Vancouver Real Estate Market, and he’s honest, responsive and full of positive energy. A five star experience over all - thank you.

reviews.text: Words can not express the pleasant experience we went through with Sal and his team. Professionalism and responsiveness as well as hard work and great attitude were only a few to name from their traits. Definitely going to recommend them to anyone who needs to buy a property in BC!

reviews.text: Sal and his team are professionals who know the various aspects of the real estate market in greater Vancouver. Sal himself pays attention to the minute details that many would overlook, which is commendable. Rod is very observant and has a patient and calming personality, which is truly helpful when the stress hormones spike during the process. We are extremely happy with and thankful for working with Sal and Rod for selling our previous house and buying our new dream house.

reviews.name: Moji Ghodousi
reviews.text: Sal is an absolute treasure! He is professional, trustworthy, fun and kind. You achieve yours goals of real estate at its best, and will have a good friend for life. He knows in and out of Vancouver real estate and can quickly grasp what fits your needs. He is a smart businessman, good strategist. Wish you and your team continued success!

We always got their honest opinion and never felt like it was about the sale. They helped us navigate all the new things we had to learn as first-time buyers. The best hard-Working realtors out there, working with them was so easy and smooth in this tough pandemic market of 2020-2021.

I would highly recommend Sal Toosi team!

reviews.name: mohsen rasoulzadehyazdi
reviews.text:
I have worked with other realtors in the past, so I was very skeptical at our first meeting with Sal Toosi TEAM, but my experience was totally different this time!

After 4 months being on the market (with another realtor) we were so stressed because we wanted to sell our home to hopefully buy a new one! And they sold our home for almost full asking price in only a few weeks.

Then the new challenge started! Looking for a single family house in the super busy North Vancouver’s market was extremely stressful and difficult as my wife and I were both working full time and all houses had multiple offers!

I’m writing this now - on New Year’s Eve- after we just removed subjects on this beautiful house in our favourite neighborhood Pemberton Heights and we can’t be more grateful as they didn’t stop trying even during Holidays! They truly care!

Sal and Rod went above and beyond and we can’t be more thankful! Highly recommend.

Mr. TOOSI and his team are very professional and responsive to thier client
they helped us to find our dream house in vancouver
Thank you so much

reviews.name: Sarah Kozachuk
reviews.text:
YOU NEED TO HIRE SAL! He is the best!

Sal is such a wonderful person and realtor. He sold our condo in less than a week for above asking!!!
We came to him right after a terrible experience with another realtor, and he completely turned everything around. He helped us pick up the pieces, and guided us through a crazy stressful time. We felt a weight lift from our shoulders after our first chat with Sal.

He basically worked a miracle. He went above and beyond in every way. Stored things for us, staged for us, and organized everything while we were across the country and all during the pandemic!

Sal and his team were such friendly helpful people.
We couldn’t have asked for a better outcome and we can’t praise Sal and his team enough.

reviews.name: Im4n F
reviews.text: Sal is helping me and my wife to buy a house . He is very professional, knowledgeable and organized real estate agent with a lot of useful connections that made our experience much easier.

reviews.name: Colin Kozachuk
reviews.text:
Who you hire MATTERS!

We had to sell our Mount Pleasant condo ASAP due to a family illness. We hired a realtor we thought we could trust and were we ever wrong. After 43 days and no offers we realized we made a huge mistake. Condos were selling all around us, including neighbours. Nothing but excuses and stalling tactics from this company. Finally we terminated the contract. Our spirits were low and the clock was ticking.

ENTER SAL!!!!
Sal was referred to us by close friends who just had a very positive experience with him. From the first phonecall with Sal, we already felt a tremendous weight lifted from our shoulders. He did his research and found out where the previous realtors failed.
Sal and his team completely staged and photographed our condo over a couple days and the listing was back up within a week.
The condo was SOLD IN 6 DAYS!!!

We couldn't be happier with our experience with Sal. He restored our faith in the realty industry. If you're reading this and are still unsure, just remember who you hire matters and Sal is the real deal.

reviews.name: Aidin Tavakkol
reviews.text:
Working with Sal was absolutely amazing! But most importantly he is a n amazing negotiator and your investment and trust in him pays off when you are closing the deal. He managed to save us bunch of money by very smart last minute negotiation.

I highly recommend using him as your realtor.

reviews.text:

reviews.text: Sold our house very quickly for more than we were expecting!  Sal has a great eye for what needs to be done to present and price your home for a fast and profitable sale.  Highly recommended by my family and I

reviews.text: Sal is not only our friend, he is also our real estate advisor. He is more than just a realtor who takes you to open houses and shows you properties. I highly recommend working Sal.

reviews.name: Goli
reviews.text:
Do you like to sell your home at a desirable price in a short time? Sal and Mehrdad are the best realtors who can help you out in any situation. They are professional, patient, supportive, honest, hardworking, and most important, they are super positive.
It was such a pleasure working with Sal and Mehrdad. We absolutely recommend them, as they are the best!
Sal and his team staged our home before they put it on the market in an amazing way, and sold it in a short time.
Sal and Mehrdad, you are truly professionals at what you do!

reviews.name: Dilyar Murat
reviews.text: My good friends in Vancouver reached out to me a while back and asked me if i knew any professional in the area that could help them buy their dream home. I immediately thought of Sal and man did go he beyond above and beyond my expectation. Such a down to earth guy! If you are in Vancouver area and looking for a professional realtor, , Sal is your man!

reviews.name: Sanaz Saber
reviews.text:
Hands down Sal& Mehrdad are the one of the best realtors in Vancouver. We worked with Sal& Mehrdad to sell our place during these challenging times and they were very focused and responsive to get activity on our unit and get it sold and they helped us to buy our new place in less than a few weeks!
The best part about working with Sal& Mehrdad was that we didn’t need to worry about anything since they  took care of everything. The process of selling and buying a property with them was very pleasant and stress free. I would definitely recommend Sal & Mehrdad and their team!

reviews.name: Melissa Barazandegan
reviews.text:
Sal Toosi and his team helped us to sell our townhouse in Kitsilano and he was outstanding.
Before choosing a real estate agent, I conducted a lot of research to see who would be the best choice based on the investment they make into selling the property (time and effort, not necessarily financially) and how they promote their listings. The Sal Toosi Real Estate Team stood out as the best Vancouver has to offer: their rankings are excellent, their social media presence was strong, and I could tell they put a lot of work into their listings.
We spoke with Sal and then met with him at our home. He spent hours answering our questions, providing objective data regarding how many homes they sell, how long their listings typically stay on the market, and providing tons of info on comps in the area. Sal made the process incredibly easy and took extra steps many other Realtors don't (but should), like having a pro come and give us painting, staging, having professional photographs taken, and a lot more.
When we saw our listing we were blown away. His hard work and knowledge of what it takes to sell a home really paid off - our listing looked amazing and knocked out the competition. The first buyer that saw the property put in an offer 100 K over asking price. Our townhouse went under contract 1 day after we put it on the market. We accepted and Sal walked us through every step of the closing process. It couldn't have been a more pleasant experience.
I've recommended the Sal Toosi Real Estate Team to everyone I know. He's a true professional and a genuinely nice guy. I realize it won't always be this easy to sell your home, but I think you'd be hard pressed to find a better Realtor.

reviews.name: Babak Bijari
reviews.text:
Over all, this was a very high quality Real Estate service, Sal. Thank you for everything you and your team did for us.

We had a great experience with you even thou it was so short; given the fact that there was another unit for Sale in our complex for over a month, we can’t believe it only took you one week to sell our home for OVER ASKING PRICE!

We feel lucky to have chosen you and we highly recommend you to all our family and friends.

reviews.name: Salma Kashani
reviews.text: Sal is an energetic, resourceful, and easy to work with. I had very specific requirements in mind for my new apartment and I needed to purchase one as quickly as possible. Sal listened patiently and understood what I had in mind. He helped me look at more than 20 units in three weeks. On the fourth week, we found my dream apartment. Sal successfully negotiated the price down to make it work within my budget and provided his resources in every step of the way including the renovation. I loved working with him and I look forward to working with him again in the future!

reviews.name: TheBigNiceGuy
reviews.text: Sal helped us sell our condo during the Covid-19 pandemic. He was very helpful. He help co-ordinate viewings, appointments etc. It was very nice working with Sal for the entire process.

reviews.name: Masha Rademakers
reviews.text: We had a really good experience with Sal. He is very professional and keeps his standards high. Sal negotiated a great price for us, and we are very happy to have worked with him. He is always available to strategize and talk and goes out of his way to provide a good service. Would definitely recommend working with him. Thank you Sal!

reviews.name: Rosa Saii
reviews.text: I am so thankful for you and the very good job you did selling my apartment.I am happy with my timing and the choice to have you “Sal”, and all of your great service professionals on my side.

reviews.name: Megan Dalton
reviews.text: Sal truly cares. He went above and beyond to find me the exact property I was seeking. He had my back throughout the process and found me my dream home below my budget. I highly recommend working with Sal.

reviews.name: denise jones
reviews.text: I interviewed three realtors in my search for a listing agent.  Sal was the quickest to respond to texts and emails.  When we met to interview him, he brought me a beautiful plant as his business card.  We was very courteous about meeting outside due to COVID 19.  He literally took my decluttering items himself in his own car and stored them at his house.  He added decorative items to stage my place, took photos and videos within a week.  We listed on Friday and had negotiated a full ask offer by Tuesday!  He is moving my items back to my house, he is organizing to have the holes in our walls patched up, he offers travel vouchers so that you can get out of town for the first open house, he made social media videos to showcase our home, literally I can't speak highly enough of his customer care... he even sent me a video of where people touched items in my condo and showed me that he personally sanitized the areas after the viewing to put my mind at ease.  I highly recommend Sal.  To be honest, a lot of people think that anyone can list their place in this hot market in Vancouver... but if you want to get every penny and you want to have someone that is smart, that will anticipate your needs, charming, always well dressed and always aiming to exceed your expectations... that's Sal.  We are looking for our next home now and for all our future transactions, we will surely be using Sal Toosi.

reviews.name: Omid Kia
reviews.text: We bought our first home through Sal Toosi Vancouver Real Estate. They were highly Open and engaged through the process, keeping us updated at all times and chasing actions to keep the purchase moving smoothly. Good experience from start to finish. The whole process with Sal Toosi & Mehrdad Haghjoo has been easy. They actually listen to you and make it all seem less stressful. Would definitely recommend.

reviews.name: Sana Zahmatbar
reviews.text:
We had an amazing experience working with Sal. He is very knowledgeable and trustworthy about the Real Estate market in Vancouver. He will make sure that his client are getting the best deals in the city, so that makes it easy to trust him.

The highlight of the experience is that we were not super happy about our new condo situation and Sal had it painted and professionally cleaned as a gift to us!

I’ve known Sal for a long time, he is a very lively and passionate person in everything he does, and I highly recommend him.

reviews.name: Kevin Wilson
reviews.text: Sal and his team are incredibly professional and personable. They marketed and sold our home during a very challenging time during  COVID-19 restrictions.  His attention to detail, calm assurance, and flexibility where succesful with care to health and nerves. We recommend Sal and his team to anyone seeking proven caring experience.

reviews.name: Cam Auge
reviews.text: Super happy with Sal's services! He helped us with the purchase of our dream apartment in the WestEnd.  He is extremely professional and all he cares is the happiness of his clients. He is creative, hard worker and available. I will recommend using Sal as your realtor, he is a master negotiator!

reviews.name: EM Seyfi
reviews.text:
Sal became my pal in an instant. He is a good human. Lovely to chat with, and absolutely professional. He is the guy you want to spend time with.
We talked hours and hours on the options. When we chose a place he took over a week to go over all the building minutes, line by line. To make sure he sent all the documents to a third party professional company to double check. He sat with the owners agent several times to negotiate the deal. Usually the realtors send written offers and done. But he took the initiative and talked to them in person not once but several times. He himself insisted on the inspection of the condo and paid the fees out if his pocket. When we wanted to move in, he booked cleaning and moving teams for us and also covered all the expenses. The final shot came after we moved in, he came to our place with a gift. Omg am I in the heaven? N
I worked with two realtors previously.
But this guy treated me like his own brother.
Thank you Sal toosi for being such an amazing soul.🙏🙏🙏

reviews.name: Hamed Khatami
reviews.text:
Excellent service all round from 1st inquiry through to completion.
Sal is a smart strategist, our communications were prompt and relevant.
I am a very analytical person, Sal answered all my questions and found a solution for different conditions swiftly.

I would definitely recommend him and his team and in particular, Mr.Mehrdad Haghjoo, who was always polite, patient, courteous and understood our needs.
I had planned for a three-month buy/sell process in the current market. Sal and his team made it in 10 business days. In the first open house, we had four offers overpriced.

Always try to be smart, ask yourself questions and try to find the answers from different sources and work with trustworthy and smart people.
Sal and his team are smart and trustworthy.

We have had a few unpleasant and/or malfunctioning real estate experiences  previously - but not with Sal. I recommend him without hesitation and have already put him to work on another project for us.

reviews.name: Shahab Bodin5
reviews.text: Sal toosi is one of the best person I have known •  all of us need  one Sal in our life 🌸

reviews.text:
We recently bought our first house in North vancouver. working with Sal toosi and his team, was nothing less than extraordinary.
Sal is very professional at the same time very friendly, accommodating and reliable.
Mehrdad is absolutely the best. He went above and beyond his duties. We found exactly what we wanted and they made it happen. No matter what time day or night they were always willing and eager to help.

Sal and Mehrdad you both rock🖐🏻🤗🙏🏻

reviews.text: We worked with Sal to sell our house and the process could not be smoother! Sal and his team are very professional and friendly, and I highly recommend working with them for any real state matter.

reviews.text: Such an amazing experience buying my house with Sal. He's extremely patient and knowledgable and he doesn't give up until he finds you your dream home. Highly recommended.

reviews.name: Dena Ghotbi
reviews.text:
Sal is a positive, energetic person and he is passionate about his job. He helped me to buy a lovely apartment in the Mount Pleasant neighborhood. I was a first homebuyer and had multiple questions and doubts, but Sal was patient through this process and he showed me the different options and explained everything thoroughly. You can trust Sal’s negotiation skills. I had a wise purchase within my budget because of Sal’s follow-up, his excellent negotiation skills and the tips he provided to me.

I also appreciate Farzad's help on mortgage approval. Farzad works in Sal's team and he is a very professional, dedicated Mortgage Broker. Since I didn't have enough knowledge about mortgage, Farzad was so patient and he explained everything to me in details. He never left my questions without answer even I reached out to him during the weekend or evenings after working hours. He worked hard that I could get the best mortgage rate from the bank.

I had a short experience with Sal's colleague, Mehrdad (Rod). But, during that short time, Rod showed me some homes in different neighbourhoods that I could gain a better perspective of what I want. One day,  I left a document at home while I was at work and we were supposed to send the document right away to the seller. Rod went above and beyond and helped me to send the document on time. Rod is really professional and helpful.

I would like to say many thanks to Sal and his team. I wish them great success in all coming projects.

reviews.name: Mel H
