title: Ron Parpara PREC - Vancouver Realtor
address: 1286 Homer St #400, Vancouver, BC V6B 2Y5, Canada

reviews.name: Justin Long
reviews.text: Ron demonstrated remarkable professionalism and patience while selling our home. We set a record in our neighbourhood and Ron helped us through every step of the process to show just how much value we had to offer. Thank you Ron!

reviews.name: Susan Rafanan
reviews.text: Ron and his Team worked hard to get our dream home. Ron was really authentic and didn't pressure us to buy anything. Instead he listened to our concerns and tried to look for a place that we truly can be happy with. He also has a wonderful team behind him. During the open houses the itinerary was set with good spacing between viewings. They were also able to act on the houses we wanted to bid on quickly. When we did the house inspection Ron even went with the inspector himself and did a video call with us to do the live inspection (as we didn't have time to go to the place ourselves). We are so happy to get our new house with Ron and Teams help. They made the buying process pleasant.

reviews.name: Barry Krause
reviews.text: My husband and I recently needed an experienced realtor to sell our 3-bedroom Vancouver condo. We were so fortunate that Ron accepted to take on this challenge at the beginning of January when the market did not seem particularly favourable but what an experience! Ron went above and beyond our expectations by taking charge of two upgrade projects and overseeing professional cleaning and impressive staging so that everything would be ready for market on February 1. His hard work relieved us of all the pressure of having to do this ourselves, especially since we live half an hour away. He communicated with us continuously, remained positive and supportive throughout the process, and attended to every detail. From February 1-9 Ron and his two colleagues, Jordan and Angela, hosted an amazing 70+ showings. His efforts were so successful that our condo sold in just 8 days at a record setting price!  We would highly recommend Ron to a friend, relative or anyone who is looking for a realtor who is highly competent, delightful to work with, trustworthy, and professional in every respect.  It is not surprising that he is ranked one of the best in the city. Thank you, Ron!

reviews.name: Kevin Ruston
reviews.text: I was fortunate to find Ron as a first time home buyer. He is very knowledgeable in the local market (Burnaby) and patiently advised me away from many properties that would have been bad investments. He was always looking out for my best interest. From start to finish he made the purchase effortless and proved to me what an honest and hard working realtor is supposed to be. Ron also negotiated my buying price for under asking in a hot market and a desirable location. Thank you Ron!

reviews.name: Masi Bardi
reviews.text: I have had the pleasure of working with Ron on multiple transactions, serving opposite me as a listing Realtor in one instance and as a buying Realtor in the other. Each time the process was seamless. I look forward to the next transaction!!

reviews.name: Steve Saretsky
reviews.text: My clients recently purchased a house off Ron and had a great experience. He was very professional and great to work with!

reviews.name: Julia koh
reviews.text: This is a note to Sellers looking for a listing agent. I met Ron and his team through a Tom Ferry conference. Here's what I learned and know from experience  about his team. They will contact realtors directly before your property even gets listed and this will create more demand for your property when it gets listed. Just have a look at his video testimonials. Not to mention he specializes in selling houses and really understands the market and strategy to get your house sold for a fair price in a reasonable time frame. If your Vancouver/Burnaby house has asbestos, mold, oil tank, structural concerns, old wiring, etc Ron will be able to find you a reputable specialist who can help remediate for a fair price. Also he has a background in rental properties so it’s very valuable because either you are an investor and need someone to know the rental market in depth and/or you have prospective buyers coming to look at your  house and will have questions about the rental market specifically and demographics for the neighborhood. I’m a Seattle agent and I know first hand how important it is to have the right agent on your side. Ron dominates the Vancouver market!

reviews.name: Karen Millar
reviews.text: This was the 5th property we have sold and Ron was far and away the best agent we've had. We sold an Olympic Village condo and Ron's impressive knowledge of the area and the other agents who operate in this area helped us sell the condo in under 3 weeks. He put together a very complete marketing plan and worked very hard to generate interest in the condo. He is  on top of all the details and kept us in the loop every step of the way.  His assistance with staging was invaluable. I highly recommend Ron as a real estate agent. Thank you Ron!!

reviews.name: Sha Broqueza
reviews.text: Ron sells detached properties as well. Let me remind everyone to go with someone that will represent your property that puts more time and energy into marketing, showing, negotiating and selling your property for the highest price possible. He will get you the best price and just hand him the key and he takes care of all repairs, cleaning, trades, issues and all the things that arise during a course of selling your house. I researched extensively online and watched his video testimonials and vlogs to get a better idea of his style and acumen. We were very happy with our decision to work with Ron!

reviews.name: Eran Bergman
reviews.text:
Ron helped me buy my first property (condo) 6 months ago but our journey has started almost 5 years ago when I moved to Vancouver as a new immigrant and dreamt of owning my own place.
It took me a very long time to get an understanding of what sort of property I want and what are my priorities and all of that during the crazy real-estate market of those days. Through this journey Ron offered his support, knowledge, experience and infinite patience through countless open houses documents reads and deals negotiations which finally matured 6 months ago.
Ron is the kind of realtor who will tell it like it is and not look to make a quick buck but instead will do what is right for his client because that's the kind of guy he is.
If you are looking for a true professional with vast experience and a master of the realty trade this is the guy for you!

reviews.name: Audrey M
reviews.text:
When I inherited my family home in the Brentwood area of Burnaby after my father's death in 2018, I had a very important decision to make.  Since my husband and I live and work in the Fraser Valley, we were not keen on moving to Burnaby and commuting further to work.  We also did not want to bother with any renovations to the house.

Since I have a major disability, it was easier for my husband to search
online for a suitable realtor.  In late August, 2018, we decided to choose
Ron Parpara to help us with the sale of my house.

The house was put on the market in early September and was finally
successfully sold in April, 2019 after multiple offers.  The first offer in
October looked promising but the buyer pulled out because of financing
issues.  Many low ball offers followed which didn't amount to anything
suitable.  The final offer which came in February and revised in April, hit
the jackpot with me and the buyers.

After the completion date in July, Ron Parpara arranged a celebratory lunch for my husband and me, the buyers, as well as himself and the buyers' realtor.  It was so good to meet the nice people that bought my house.  My husband and I are very happy and so are the buyers with their property.  I know that they will take good care of the place.

My husband and I are definitely pleased and very satisfied with the job that Mr. Parpara did to get my house sold.  We will be hiring him again to assist us in buying a house in the Fraser Valley.

Ron Parpara has a very pleasant personality and demeanor.  Since I cannot text, he was willing to communicate in person, by phone, or through email.

He was always patient, kind, thoughtful, and willing to go the extra miles
to meet my personal needs and preferences.  Even when he was busy, Mr.
Parpara never made me feel ignored or unimportant.  He would return all
phone calls and emails in a timely manner.  He made extra phone calls to
find out certain information on my behalf.  He referred me and my husband to a real estate lawyer, oil tank company, a handy man and pest control company when necessary.

Mr. Parpara met us at our home, at the house in Burnaby, at lawyers' offices and wherever we needed him to.  He never lost patience when he had to take the extra time to explain any documentation.  Until I got comfortable with signing documentation over the computer, Ron was willing to meet us so I could sign actual paper work which took some effort on my part.

Ron Parpara is a very honest, ethical, dedicated and professional realtor. My husband and I sincerely recommend him to anyone who is looking for a highly skilled negotiator who does a very thorough and detailed job.

Audrey M

reviews.name: John Peterson
reviews.text: Ron made a big impact on our family as our agent.From the get go he quickly finds out what is important and then walks you through the entire process and minimizes the burden and stress of selling your home. He's available whenever you need him and no showing gets missed.In a business where the majority of agents do what is most lucrative, when you find someone that works in your best interest stick with them. We’ve worked with other agents in the past and know from experience.

reviews.name: Brennen Clouse
reviews.text:
Working with Ron has been nothing but a great experience. As a Realtor working in Seattle I would refer Ron to anyone I know looking to buy or sell in Vancouver. Ron and I are in a group of the best agents in North America and we work together to help our clients.

Ron is one of the most respected and hardest working agents in Canada and only takes on a select number of clients at any given time, otherwise he will refer them to other reputable agents that he's worked with personally, creating a great experience for his clients.

Ron's background in rental properties gives him an edge up knowing the preferred investment options for clients and attracting and keeping high quality tenants, and knowing the buildings, quality and what goes on in these buildings day to day, which most agents wouldn't know.

I highly recommend Ron to anyone looking to buy or sell in Vancouver.

reviews.name: Martha Younger
reviews.text:
I recently had the pleasure of working with Ron when I only had four days to find a house in Vancouver. I don’t live in Vancouver and I travel a great deal of the time so time is of the essence.
Ron lined up several homes that met my criterion, set up appointments that fit in with my tight schedule, did all the legwork and due diligence necessary to make sure the home was appropriate, and finished the deal! In all my years of working with real estate agents I can honestly say that Ron is head and shoulders above the rest and I can highly recommend him.

reviews.name: Philip Harris
reviews.text: We've used Ron for two sales and one purchase so far and would use him again in an instant. He's very thorough, kept us informed every step of the way, and far exceeded our expectations. Ron's very down to earth and friendly, and clearly had our best interests at heart. We couldn't be happier with the results. Highly recommended.

reviews.name: Peter Doudkine
reviews.text: Ron did an amazing job helping my wife and I purchase an apartment.   We were first time buyers and Ron kept us informed throughout the whole process, providing clear instructions on what we needed to do.  He also went above and beyond in providing us with requested information, addressing any concerns we had, and negotiating price with the seller.   In the end we acquired the apartment we loved, in the neighborhood we wanted for a respectable amount under asking price (Ron worked extra hard to get the price even lower, even though we were comfortable making an offer.  He unded up saving us even more money).  After the deal, Ron helped us with cleaning and finding contractors for touch ups.  I've already recommended Ron to a friend and they're also very happy with his work.   A++ agent!

reviews.name: Lindsay Weiss
reviews.text: The thing I liked best about Ron is he will only takes on a certain number of clients at one time to ensure the best for all his clients.In this volatile market the peace of mind of hiring a professional to represent your property is so critical and building the trust with Ron has been very rewarding and now I’m referring him to all our family and friends.He was an essential part in receiving the highest price for our home.

reviews.name: Howard Lin
reviews.text:
I had Ron represent me as a purchaser of a 2-bedroom investment unit in Downtown Vancouver. He did a pretty good job.

We had a good discussion at the very beginning about what exactly I was looking for in the right unit. He tried to put himself in my shoes to understand what my expectations were. He also asked me an interesting question – what my backup plan would be if prices surged beyond my budget. It wasn’t something I had thoroughly thought over so it was prudent for him to bring that up for me to think about.

Then came the search. Ron has developed a fairly good knowledge of the downtown stratas over the years with his sales and property management experience. It did take a while to find good units though, due to the lack of inventory. We were outbid a couple of times, and simply too slow in some other instances. Eventually, we found a decent unit, quickly scheduled a showing, and prepared to submit an offer.

Ron was then able to put his negotiation skills to work. Our offer was met with a counteroffer with a higher price. I was ready, able, and willing to meet the seller with a price in the middle. However, Ron told me to be firm on my original price, and to let him continue negotiating. I reluctantly agreed, thinking it wouldn’t work, but I was wrong! Accepted offer!

We had a four-day subject removal period so Ron kicked it into high gear. He pointed some things out in the strata documents. Also, the unit happened to be already tenanted, but Ron drew on his property management experience to make sure there were no issues. Subjects were removed, and Ron continued working to ensure a smooth transition right through to the closing date.

reviews.name: Nicolette Richardson
reviews.text:
Ron is absolutely amazing. We had been trying to find a realtor for a few weeks without success. Somehow we came across Ron's website and before we even mentioned that we wanted him to be our realtor he gave us such amazing advice.

At the time we were out of province and Ron did everything to make this a seamless process. When we finally decided to buy a home we made an offer before even seeing it.  That's how much we trust Ron.

He would FaceTime us and take us through a home, do a mini- interview with the owner. We would send him a list of places we liked and he would give us his unbiased opinion. When he didn't know, he would confer with a colleague just to make sure we were getting accurate info.

If you're considering any kind of home purchase, look no further... Ron is the realtor you need.

reviews.name: Amram Larviv
reviews.text: We could not be more satisfied with the work that Ron did as our agent. He was always prompt in answering our questions, proactive in the process of selling, and our results were more than we expected. The buying process was smooth and he didn't rush or pressure us to make a fast purchase. He negotiated a worthy deal for us and we are extremely happy with our new apartment. We highly recommend him to anyone looking for a home!

reviews.name: Kim Lee
reviews.text: Ron is a rockstar real estate agent and always has his client's best interest in mind. What makes him stand out from most realtors is his exceptional marketing and his social media presence. I've worked with a lot of agents and I've seen first hand how he takes good care of his sellers. Ron creates a successful marketing plan for all his listings. His duty to his clients is like no other. Highly recommend Ron for those looking to list their homes.

reviews.name: Ezra istiroti
reviews.text:
Real estate is something that you should not take lightly, it is a very important decision in any family's life.

Having Ron on our side was a great way to make sure that what we had in mind was the right choice for us.

He provides a very well rounded service, he knows what are the right questions to ask when dealing with property managers and developers and he always kept challenging our ideas in order to make sure that we were certain of our choice.

He is very detailed oriented and he even went above and beyond by visiting some of the places that we were looking at and provided a detailed comparison with pros and cons of all the properties.

I can't recommend him enough.

If you are in the look for a house or property, you can always count on him

reviews.name: Ricky Dhillon
reviews.text: I had the pleasure of working with Ron when he reached out to my company (Memorable Maids) to ensure his clients properties are cleaned deeply prior to listing. The level of attention to detail Ron has really reflects in his work and I can highly recommend him as a great listing agent who will take the necessary extra steps to ensure your property sells for the highest price!

reviews.name: Barb Parker
reviews.text:
I chose Ron when we were downsizing to sell our house and buy a townhouse. He is honest, hard-working and has years of Experience. Once I listed with him he took care of Everything. He is not interested in a quick sale but only in providing personal professional service. Ron is a Fantastic Negotiator and he sold our house at a price much higher than comparable properties and over list price!

Then Ron found us a townhouse in a quiet upscale area. He checked the property and strata's minutes thoroughly and told us about every possible problem with it before we bought. He also explained other documents such as the depreciation and engineers report in great detail. This was very beneficial before making our final decision.

Again he negotiated the price down and we bought a large beautiful townhouse at a price much lower than any of the recent sales.

Ron is the Best Realtor I have ever worked with. With Ron you can expect Superior results with all of your Real estate transactions.

reviews.name: Mike R
reviews.text:
I had the pleasure of working with Ron on a deal and the professionalism that he showed throughout the entire process was amazing. He was always on time for appointments, very knowledgeable to the product that he was selling, and took the time to show my clients and I around the building and answer any and all questions we had. He went above and beyond to make sure that not only was his seller happy, but also that myself and my buyer were happy as well. Ron's clients can feel confident that they have a professional and knowledgeable realtor by their side to guide them through the process when they are buying or selling a home. I look forward to doing another deal with you down the road Ron.

- Mike Roque
The GO Team
Dexter Realty

reviews.name: Ilya Margulis
reviews.text: Ron did a great job. He is a truly honest realtor who works hard to make sure his buyers get the place that is right for them. Ron doesn't push places on buyers that may not be the perfect place, even if that means a lot more work on his part to keep doing showings and finding the right place. I would definitely recommend Ron to friends and family as he cares about his clients, and not just about making a quick buck.

reviews.name: Vick Lam
reviews.text: Worked with Ron in Yaletown last year in a penthouse transaction. He's fast replied and  really professional to deal with in the whole transaction from the beginning until the possession. All parties were Happy ending!!

reviews.name: Mike Marino
reviews.text: My wife and I recently used Ron to help us find a place in Burnaby.  Throughout the entire process, Ron was very patient, honest, and helpful.  He met with us on several occasions and helped us find a home that met all of our needs.  I wouldn’t hesitate to use Ron again in the future.

reviews.name: Brian Traboulay
reviews.text:
I hired Ron almost 2 decades ago when I was a Regional Manager for an International Insurance Company.
The qualities that Ron brought to the interview carried all the way through to his Clients.
His level of commitment to meeting his Clients needs and work ethic was unprecedented.
I would highly recommend Ron if you are seeking a capable, competent, knowledgeable and compassionate person for your Real Estate needs!
Fast forward to today, he’s my ‘GO TO’ Realtor for any Vancouver Clients as I’m also a Realtor in London Ontario. He has a wealth of knowledge about the changing market and is very well connected. He knows more about Vancouver neighborhoods and buildings than anyone I know.

reviews.name: Alexia Bentley
reviews.text:
Ron is a refreshingly honest and hardworking rare find in a market of thousands. After hours and hours of researching the plethora of real estate agents in Vancouver I was lucky enough to happen upon this Ace! Upon my first meeting with Ron his open and honest nature is immediately apparent and it put me at ease instantly! I could sense his honest desire to really listen to my specific needs and his ongoing dedication continued far beyond even what I expected.

An absolute professional, he is skilled at negotiations, knowing exactly when a gentle convincing nudge is necessary and yet a perfect shark when he needed to be. He has such a knack for systematically breaking down each and every step along the way leaving you always feeling informed and more importantly, confident that he's working hard for what you need.

Ron is the real deal. His communication was constant, clear, and informative. He calmly and expertly answered all of my questions about the process which left me feeling assured and informed.

Without any hesitation I encourage you to reach out to Ron whether you are buying or selling. Save yourself from all of the stress and disappointment of maneuvering through this tough market with an agent that doesn't have your best interest at heart and just call Ron!

reviews.name: A Z
reviews.text:
I've known Ron for 7 years on both a professional and personal level.

As other reviewers have highlighted, he's honest, passionate, hardworking and highly experienced in real estate. His number one priority is keeping his clients happy and stress free. I personally witnessed him making/taking late night calls to ensure his client doesn't miss offer opportunities and meets deadlines.

He is also very meticulous when listing properties. He makes sure they are marketed and showcased effectively and distinctively online and then in person when the time comes.

I would recommend Ron for all your real estate needs. He understands the local housing market here in Vancouver and he gets the job done in a professional manner.

reviews.name: Jan St. Amand
reviews.text:
Ron is a great realtor. He was very patient with me as I bought my first ever home in North Vancouver. I appreciated that he is extremely detailed oriented and gave me all the information I needed to make my final decision. Buying a home can be very stressful but Ron was always there to answer all my questions and guide me through the process. I would highly recommend Ron to anyone who needs a realtor.
I have been living in my condo for 4 years now and I am still in contact with Ron. He is always available to answer my questions.

reviews.name: Jon Keith
reviews.text:
Ron was recommended to me by a friend for my first home purchase, and without a doubt, Ron definitely exceeded all expectations. As a first-time buyer, I was entering this process as a complete newbie, along with a short deadline. Given all that, Ron took the time to walk me through the whole process, and showed me many properties to get a good feel for what I liked & did not like, rather than just rush a quick sale.

Once we found something that worked well, rather than settle for the seller’s first ‘best & final’, which I would’ve taken given the circumstances, he encouraged to play it slow through multiple expired offers over a few weeks, and in the end managed to negotiate the sellers down quite a bit from list (and well under budget). After that, his high degree of thoroughness clearly showed, as he repeatedly chased down both the seller’s agent & strata for updated documents, and helped me go through every key document. He also researched just about everything else you can think of – he looked up the developer’s history, recent & pending developments in the nearby area, past & potential issues with city & more. Further, he has a very good network of high-quality real estate professionals (lawyers, inspections, brokers) & tradesmen, many of whom I leveraged during my purchase. By the time we removed subjects, I was very confident with the purchase, as Ron goes through pretty much everything in detail.

Even after the deal closed, Ron was still checking in & assisting. He helped set up the move, lined up additional professional cleaning & a locksmith, and offered to advise long-term on any sort of problem with the purchase or help lining up the right people for repairs or improvements.  There was also a residual issue with a fireplace, which Ron quickly resolved with the seller’s agent & arranged a prompt inspection to remove all worry.

I quickly learnt throughout this process that it is quite easy to make costly mistakes. You need someone on your side like Ron who will fight for best price, ensure the due diligence is done to the highest degree, and make sure you are comfortable with what you purchase. Ron is very thorough & details-oriented - he is willing to go through just about everything, will go through pros/cons on all properties, and we even spent a good few hours just walking through the first purchase contract (which I highly recommend). He helped out immensely on all the various bumps along the way, and, even prepared me for potential issues & expenses over the next five years, as well as considerations upon resale. I have already recommended Ron to a couple other friends (they will be in good hands), and I definitely plan to come back when the time comes to sell, where his experience, hard work & meticulousness will be ever more important.

reviews.name: Jessica Kam
reviews.text: Ron was an absolute gem of a realtor. We couldn't have found anyone better. He was personable, patient, knowledgeable, and honest - all you could ask for in a realtor. From the get go, he never was pushy. He gave us all the information we needed to make an informed decision. He provided us a lot of helpful tips as first time home buyers. We were looking to buy in the East Vancouver area, and he was very familiar with the area. He was great at following up with us through the entire process, and even afterwards! We never had to chase time down. He also recommended lots of other great professionals for other parts of the buying process (like home inspectors, reno guys, etc.). We ultimately bought in the River District, after Ron took all our preferences into consideration and gave us some suggestions of places to look. He was very detailed-oriented through the entire process, and pointed out important things for us to consider. He even gave us a list of pros and cons of the property we were looking at!  Even though we were willing to go higher, he negotiated the price further down for us. There were so many little things he did that went above and beyond what typical realtors did. For example, when we moved in, the previous occupants left a large shelf and the place wasn't completely cleaned. He arranged for all those things to be taken care of, and he covered the costs. Even after we moved in, Ron has kept in touch and checking in to see how we are settling in. I cannot recommend him enough. I definitely will be suggesting Ron to people we know!

reviews.name: Flavia Marcondes
reviews.text: I was really lucky to meet Ron and Sutton Group Del Mar when I moved to Vancouver and needed to find a new home for me and my family. Not only Ron has high-end properties in his portfolio, he also works hard to answer to all our needs and make sure we are hassle-free. He was friendly, responsive and thoughtful throughout the whole time. He is a good and honest professional, that I am happy to recommend. I will certainly reach out to them again if I have the need in the future. Thank you!

reviews.name: Maryam Samiei
reviews.text:
It was a pleasure to work with Ron for a few years. He was the owner's agent for the place we rented. I always found him very helpful, polite, friendly, personable, and more than anything honest. It was easy to communicate with him and benefit from his good advice.
Even when the owner wanted to sell, Ron was still quite respectful and supportive trying to help us the whole way through.
He is definitely a good realtor to work with!

reviews.name: Ann Harris
reviews.text: We are so glad we chose Ron to act as our realtor for the sale of our Yaletown condo. He kept us updated, provided good advice every step of the way, and was kind enough to work outside normal office hours to keep the process moving as quickly as possible. He did a great job working with our tenants to ensure the viewings went smoothly. We would definitely pick Ron again.

reviews.name: Kaija O
reviews.text:
To Those Considering Buying or Selling a Property,

If you need a reliable real estate professional to handle your buying or selling needs we strongly recommend Ron Parpara.  He sold our west end condo and got a great price, very close to list price, in a cool market.  His competent and attentive sales service left my husband and myself free of the stresses normally associated with selling a home.

Ron coordinated junk removal, hiring a handyman/painter, and apartment/carpet cleaning.  He paid for these services from his own incentive program.  Also he handled all strata related issues like fire inspection and duct cleaning to avoid any additional fines.

We enjoyed Ron's knowledgeable, trustworthy, and patient style.  We would certainly employ him again as our realtor.

Sincerely,

Kaija Oliver and Alfredo Coccimiglio

reviews.name: McKay Wood
reviews.text:
I am a mortgage broker and have worked with Ron and found him to be an excellent realtor to work with.  I have found in my experience that working with a realtor that has experience and knows how to negotiate makes a big difference. It be the difference between getting a higher price for you property or making countless offer only to be outbid.

He has had many years of experience and his disposition is one that puts you at ease and no  pressure in his approach yet is willing to work very hard to get just what is needed.

I recommend Ron for all your Real Estate needs and you won't be disappointed with the service and work and relationship you will have as a result.

reviews.name: Ice Meneses
reviews.text:
Ron has exceptional marketing skills with a strong online emphasis and is a savvy negotiator. He provides objective statistics while giving detailed feedback after each showing and thoroughly takes you through the step by step of the selling process.

Once you hand over the key to him, you do not have to worry about anything else. Expect him to respond quickly and do personal phone calls or meet in person if that’s preferred whether you are discussing an offer, feedback or any other property detail and believe me there are so many things that come up before, during and after.

He's also the one person you want representing you when buying, not just when selling. Smooth transactions and peace of mind is what he brings to the table. Having one high performing agent (so there’s no miscommunications along the way) is the best way to go by far. It's so much simpler and there's less risk for misinformation. I also really like that he won’t take on more clients than he can handle.

reviews.name: Nebojsa Cn
reviews.text: Ron was my realtor for a condo that I purchased two years ago in Richmond. His work-ethic and knowledge are second to none. Being a first time home buyer, I had a lot of questions and Ron was able to put me at ease by answering all of them. From beginning to end, Ron was available 24/7 and was very proactive in finding me listings to view. Within 3 months I had found the perfect place and with Ron's negotiating skills we were able to drop the price significantly. I found the perfect place and could not have done it without Ron's assistance. Even after my move in he still offered his services and answered any questions I had. I would HIGHLY recommend Ron to anyone looking for a realtor who will work in your best interest. Currently I am looking to sell my place and have listed it with Ron. I have received multiple offers already and am very pleased with the time and effort Ron has put in to market my place and get the best possible price.

reviews.name: Soriah Kanji
reviews.text:
Ron was great to work with. He was the buyer's agent for one of my listings in the West End, which required more work than usual as the building had upcoming work. He managed this difficult purchase gracefully and helped his buyer navigate and understand the engineer's reports and associated documents, which required a significant amount of time and effort.

Ron is a professional through and through -- knowledgeable, patient, and courteous. He was an absolute pleasure to work with and I look forward to working with him again in the future.

reviews.name: Natalie Luo
reviews.text: Ron is a super agent and the most honest and hard working professional I have met not only in real estate, but any other industry or profession!! He helps me with everything with my property and knows the buildings in Yaletown. He specializes in dealing with investment properties. Thank you Ron for being an exceptional Vancouver realtor and helping me with my unit at Freesia. Your experience and skill do not go unnoticed and there’s a reason you are ranked as the Top 3 Agents in Vancouver! I can’t thank you enough. I’m glad I got to meet you.

reviews.name: Monika Schwartzman
reviews.text: Ron Parpara helped me and my family in the process of choosing the right home for us.  He really supported us not only by making sure that we made the best decision in our home purchase but also to help us sell our current condo so we can make an upgrade to meet our family needs and dreams.  We immediately felt a connection with Ron and it was a great asset to have his professional and friendly help in any stage of our decision.  Ron Parpara made the process of buying and selling our home a very special one and we look forward to keeping him as our realtor of choice for many years to come.

reviews.name: Polina Andreychenko
reviews.text:
Ron helped me purchase my first place in Vancouver, which was during the housing market craze. He was excellent to work with; professional, diligent, and went out of his way several times to accommodate my requests, or to ensure due diligence on his part.
One example would be hiring a surveyor at his expense to check the apartment area.
Ron was definitely a step above any realtors I have worked with in the past. He was not pushy, and gave honest advice.

It was also a plus that he knew some good people for other home buying matters. I was very impressed with the home inspector he recommended.

Overall, I had a great home-buying experience, down to the housewarming gift, and would recommend Ron!

reviews.name: Adam Clarke
reviews.text: Ron is a real pleasure to work with. As a mortgage broker, the most important aspect of a relationship with a realtor is good, open communication. After working together with several mutual clients, this is something that has always impressed me about Ron. He is quick to respond and is always willing to talk through potential hurdles, making finding solutions fast and efficient. Dedicated to his clients, a creative problem solver, and a true professional, Ron is a top shelf realtor... and a great guy too!

reviews.name: Stephane Blajberg
reviews.text: As a mortgage professional, I recently had the opportunity and pleasure of working with Ron to help a client purchase a property in North Vancouver.  Ron is a very knowledgeable, experienced, and hardworking  realtor.  His strong negotiation skills and expert knowledge of the local market were key to  securing the purchase of this property.  It’s been a great pleasure doing business with Ron and I would highly recommend him to my clients.

reviews.name: Igor Staritsin
reviews.text: Ron is by far the best agent I have ever worked with! His attention to details and big care for the whole experience made me feel that Ron is definitely a true professional since the first minute we met! He found an amazing, sunny and spacious appartment for our family in the heart of mount pleasant with a good price which is very valuable thing these days! He has been extremely helpful in the moments we had any questions or a need for anything and he is always very quick in replying and coming up with solutions! Highly recommended, big professional!

reviews.name: Alex Fermón
reviews.text:
Ron helped us sell our condo and purchase a new Townhouse for our family. He is an outstanding and reliable professional as he goes above and beyond to ensure all your house-sale-related issues are met. For example, he would help and follow up on recommendations for movers, cleaners, stagers, etc. Ron was always available for any inquires and in case he was unavailable, made sure that someone else could look after us!

He made all the right marketing recommendations end ensured having superior photos and floor plan to ensure it attracts the greatest number of buyers as well as staging the home enhancing all our properties features and bring in the wow factor and made it easy for us to tuck away the light furnishings at the end of the day as we still lived in the unit.
Also, he was always available and made sure to work closely with the other professional we were working with such as our own mortgage broker and lawyer.

The most remarkable part of Ron’s job was getting an outstanding selling price for our property, there were 2 very comparable listings which were both similar size in our building that came out a few weeks after ours and they both sold for  less than ours.

reviews.name: DJ Hip
reviews.text:
I have been very impressed with my whole experience of dealing with Ron. A very professional agent, so congratulations on a job well done!! You are definitely a leader in this industry and wish there were more agents as skilled and competent as you.

Ron Parpara is knowledgeable and an absolute pleasure to deal with. His service levels are exceptional and unprecedented. He looks after his clients beyond expectations! He is reliable and trustworthy. I will surely recommend Ron for all your real estate needs.

reviews.name: Eran Gurfinkel
reviews.text:
Ron,

Thank you so much for helping us purchase our first house!! From the get go, you helped us focus in on what we wanted (and could afford) and adjusted the search along the way accordingly.

When we found properties that we liked, the professional way in which you represented us and explained pros and cons for each property, without ever being pushy, was really appreciated.

When it came time to make an offer, you were extremely thorough in looking at the details we never would have even thought to investigate -I think your diligence saved us from what could have been a few disasters! We also appreciated your patience in explaining all the legal aspects of buying a property and walking us through the process step by step.

You also walked us through all the additional expenses that came along with buying a house, so there were no surprises at the end. Thank you for your dedication and hard work from the moment we hired you to the day you brought us the keys. - we couldn't be any happier with the excellent job you did! Thank you!

reviews.name: Ben Choe
reviews.text:
I have known Ron for more than 15 years and he has always been trustworthy. He is a great listener who genuinely cares and it shows in his interactions with other.

As a mortgage professional, I have worked with Ron on a professional level, and the clients would always mention his trustworthiness and ability to negotiate and navigate through difficult situations.

Ron is a great realtor who works well with both buyers and sellers, and I would highly recommend him to anyone who needs help from an experienced real estate professional.

reviews.name: Jimi Brockett
reviews.text:
As a fellow realtor being able to work with someone that show the same excellence and personal attention as I do is truly a gift.
Ron's easy going nature is a pleasure to work along side and his professionalism is second to none.

reviews.name: Brent R.
reviews.text:
When i first met Ron, we had a discussion about a clear plan moving forward. Ron was not in a rush at anytime. He was never overbearing and was always availiable and willing to provide information.

He was able to negotiate a clean and clear deal which was in my best interest.

I am completely satisfied with Ron's service and I would reccomend Ron to anyone who is looking to purchase a property in the Vancouver area.

reviews.name: Katia Fermon
reviews.text: Ron is a people person. He heard what we needed for our future home and tried he’s best to find it... the best part is that in less than a month he found the perfect place for us in Brentwood! He was always honest about the pro’s and con’s in each apartment, and most importantly, we always knew he was looking out for our best interests.

reviews.name: Jacob C.
reviews.text: Being a savvy investor in the condo market, I must say that Ron is hands down the best agent I’ve ever worked before compared to other agents! His recommendation has made me great profit to exit right before the market slows down! Can’t thank him enough and strongly recommend working with him for purchase and sales! Thanks again Ron!

reviews.name: Dov Barry
reviews.text: Ron is very meticulous and was successful in getting a much higher price than the market usually would have bared.  Unlike my previous realtor who accomplished nothing while they had my listing, Ron worked every day to get this listing sold.   I'm a very impatient person so I was so happy with how quickly Ron got me results.

reviews.name: Dan Jay
reviews.text:
I met Ron at an open house in false creek where he represented a seller and I was there as a potential buyer. My first impression of him was I thought he was very charming, professional, attentive, and genuinely wanted to help me find a place. After several open houses, he was able to help me negotiate, navigate, and eventually close on my first place in November. He was able to deliver on all my asks and found a place for me within his expectation (3-4 months).  In addition he helped arrange an extension contract with my new tenants, home inspection, and replace a damage fridge drawer with the previous owner. He has gone above and beyond!

I’m so happy  to have met Ron who I consider as my realtor and now friend!  I highly recommend reaching out to him if you are searching for a realtor.

reviews.name: Tim Kallok
reviews.text: I relocated to Vancouver for work and thought finding a place to live would be a stressful and daunting task. Luckily, I found a condo that Ron and his team at Sutton Del Mar manage. Not only was the condo a perfect fit for my needs, but I also felt completely at ease when I met with Ron for the first time. Being new to the country and unfamiliar with the local laws, Ron was extremely patient and made everything completely transparent and easily understandable for me. Ron and his team are top class and would not hesitate to recommend them if you are in the market to lease or buy.

reviews.name: Yoshiko Aoki
reviews.text: Ron was very helpful while we were looking for our first place. He was patient with us as we learned about the market and buying process. He would answer our questions late at night over calls that normally were supposed to be 5-10 minutes but wound end up being closer to half an hour. Ron always worked quickly, thought of our interests and was extremely professional. After lots of hard work, he helped us write a successful offer on a wonderful condo without going over asking price!

reviews.name: Irwin bliss
reviews.text:
I met Ron and instantly found him to be personable and professional. He helped me find my ideal residence, presenting me with several options and always pointing out pros and cons of each property in a very honest fashion.
I would definitely go to Ron again to have him assist in this crazy real estate environment.
Irwin Bliss

reviews.name: Francine Lombrozo
reviews.text: Last year Ron Parpara was our realtor from both ends the selling of our condo in Olympic Village and the buying of our townhouse in Coquitlam. It was my first time going through the selling AND buying experience and never really know what to expect but of course our goal was to sell a generous amount over asking and to buy for a reasonable price according to the current market. I am not sure exactly how many years experience Ron has, but I know it's a significant amount because of his outstanding work ethic. Ron guided us with so much patience through the process, taking every pre-caution and all the necessary steps to ensure our condo sold way above asking - with a total of 15 written offers!!! And also at times he may have discouraged us from making offers on a number of townhouses because he knew from his experience and intuition in the industry that we would soon enough find a home that better fits all the descriptions of our dream home 😍 It was surprisingly a pretty quick process for us, 4 weeks or so from completing the purchase  to completing the sale. We are forever grateful to have the connection with Ron Parpara-Realtor and the privilege to have him assist us in the very best way possible during this live changing time of lives. Thank-You Ron Parpara-Realtor!!!

reviews.name: Jesse Galati
reviews.text:
Ron is a true professional in all areas of Real Estate. His marketing and advertising strategies he uses to benefit his clients are some of the best i've ever seen in the business. Very unique and highly effective. It's been an absolute pleasure working with Ron over the last while and I look forward to working with him for years and years to come.

Call Ron to be your Realtor, you'll be glad you did.

reviews.name: David Hillel
reviews.text: Dealing with Ron Parpara as my Real Estate agent has been a great experience. He found me a beautiful home in the heart of Richmond which I'm very happy with. He is very professional and I highly recommend him. He is someone you can trust. He is all about making his clients happy."

reviews.name: Angela Mammon
reviews.text:
Ron was amazing at understanding what I was looking for in my home and showed me places that met and exceeded what I desired. I have been living in my place for more than 6 years and can't believe this is my home. He was very calming when the day to day stresses of house hunting got the best of me. I couldn't have done it without him. I hope that any potential clients realize that they are dealing with the BEST! I would not hesitate to recommend him to anyone I know.

I made the biggest investment with Ron Parpara's help and I'm still loving my place! It has nearly doubled in value, but more importantly its a beautiful home. Thank you Ron!

reviews.name: Pam Peterson
reviews.text: You'd be lucky to work with Ron. Transparent, amazing work ethic and knowledge and reviews were super accurate - We found Ron through our own research online and learned first hand the positive comments clients had said about him were true.

reviews.name: Alan K
reviews.text: Ron helped me find my place, which I am glad to call a home for the past 3 years. He took into consideration all my needs and has gone above and beyond. I have been recommending Ron to all my friends and family due to his honest opinion and professionalism. And I will be sure to recommend him again! He will not rest until you are fully satisfied.

reviews.name: Edmond Ho
reviews.text:
I've been working with Ron as a buyer and would highly recommend him to anyone looking for a realtor. As a first time buyer in the market, Ron has demonstrated his experience, knowledge, patience and integrity throughout my search. He's not one to push his clients into making a transaction just to make a quick buck, but advises and makes sure that you're bidding on the right unit. He's also quite attuned to the general preferences of different cultural groups, which helps him consider resale factors for his clients.

Ron is also honest to admit if he's not too knowledgeable about an area, rather than make up information to tell his clients. Having someone honest to guide you through Vancouver real estate is a huge benefit.

Ron wasn't my first realtor, but he is now my preferred realtor.

reviews.name: Tyson Quist
reviews.text: Having worked with Ron as another Sutton Group agent, he is very enjoyable to work with. Throughout the whole process he pays very close attention to each detail, makes sure nothing is missed, and makes the whole transaction as smooth as possible.

reviews.name: Hai Tran
reviews.text:
I’ve worked with Ron on more than 50 properties and he ensures all the little details are always taken care of for his clients. He’s a strong negotiator but is fair and ensures all parties are happy at the end of the day with everything.

He will do whatever it takes to satisfy his clients. Ron always hands over all properties clean and all the walls patched properly. Also, if there’s anything that may be still pending (damage), he will not rest until it’s rectified sufficiently.

Having a realtor that cares this much, means that you should put your trust in Ron and know that he can not only sell your property for a great price but also will treat everyone with the highest level of respect and professionalism.

reviews.name: Daniel Katzin
reviews.text: Ron is an experienced realtor that listens to his clients.   From knowledge of the market and initiative in tracking down information, to responsiveness and a wonderful personality to wrap it up, we could not have been happier with him as our agent.  Ron provided us with the market information we needed to make the right decision with our home.  Ron goes above and beyond and we have come to trust him and rely on his expertise and judgement in various real estate transactions.

reviews.name: WENBO LIU
reviews.text: Ron is very knowledgeable in the business as well as patient. He explained everything right at the beginning of our appointment, and he took great care of every detail on the selling when i’m overseas. I’m very satisfied to have him as my realtor. Great work Ron

reviews.name: Dan Halber
reviews.text:
Ron Parpara is one of the best realtors in all of Vancouver.

I have referred Ron several family and friends and they've all been super happy and are now also referring him.

Ron is an exceptional selling agent. The thing that puts him over the top is his exceptional ability to negotiate. He knows what to say and when in order to get leverage and puts his client in a winning position every single time.

Another area where he really excels is his team of professionals that he works with. They are all highly skilled and experienced but offer fair pricing and of course Ron has negotiated preferred pricing for all their services.

He's also a very experienced Realtor who knows and understands the business well. Ron will also be a part of the transaction even after it closes and never loses touch. He is great at closing deals.

If you are thinking of selling your property or purchasing a new one then he is the right guy for the job!

reviews.name: Alastair Leigh
reviews.text:
I first met Ron when he was representing a client from Toronto who was interested in renting our apartment. I felt he was very detail oriented and was wholly working in the interests of his client. Even though this was a small job for him, I got the feeling that he was giving his 100% and not slacking just because it might've not paid as much.

That was 100% the reason that when we needed someone to sell our Yaletown apartment at Richards Living, I called up Ron and asked if he would be interested. We wanted someone who would treat every job equally and give it 100% they had - big or small. Throughout the entire process he was in communication with us, gave us regular updates, and handled everything (getting photos, doing showings, handling repairs, etc). When issues came up, he quickly dealt with it. I would say, working with Ron really exemplifies the saying "when you do things right, people won't be sure you've done anything at all". There was little we had to do from our end, because Ron was able to manage everything seamlessly when issues arose (and they did arise) and when things needed to be taken care of. There is nothing else I could mention about Ron that the other 50 reviews haven't.

I wholly recommend Ron for his professionalism, ease of communication, skill in negotiating with other parties, and his eagerness to handle everything and adapt to any unexpected issues that arose. I would say he is definitely one realtor who earned his paycheck and provided significant value to us as his clients.

reviews.name: Steven Klohn
reviews.text: It's been a pleasure working with Ron and the rest of the group at Sutton Del Mar. Ron has been managing my rental property in Vancouver since I moved to Toronto for work; Ron is on top of strata notices and handles all communication with the tenants without any input from me, it's reassuring to know that I don't need to worry about the property with the Del Mar team looking after it. I appreciate that Ron listens to my questions and concerns and took the time to thoroughly explain how the management process works before we began - I would not hesitate to recommend him to others.

reviews.name: Bimal Lakhani
reviews.text: Ron went above and beyond to make sure we found the perfect unit in the crazy Vancouver market. More importantly, even after we moved in, Ron responded nearly immediately to repair requests and ensured problems were dealt with as fast as possible. Even more, he made sure to check in after scheduled repair appointments to confirm that problems were resolved. Couldn’t recommend Ron enough - will be sure to work him in the future whenever possible!

reviews.name: Maple SA
reviews.text: "I am very pleased with service provided by Mr. X, throughout the whole contact we kept he displayed an excellent attitude, honesty and wide experience, so that as we landed on Sunday all pending arrangements went effortlessly and by tuesday we were receiving our home."

reviews.name: Matthew Stevenson
reviews.text: I've worked with Ron in both his capacity as a real estate agent looking to get into property ownership and then later as a tenant when i decided to take a different route. In all our dealings Ron has demonstrated a high level of professionalism. He is attentive and responsible and shows genuine caring and investment into the happiness and wellbeing of his clients.

reviews.name: A P
reviews.text: Ron is an excellent realtor and is a top professional in his field because he was able to get me 18K more for the sale of my townhome which was a comparable sale and similar in size to the others who sold for so much less in this market. Also, my townhome did not have any extensive renovations or an open kitchen and he still got me more money than any other realtor who was selling something similar to mine. He works hard for his clients and went above and beyond my expectations!!!!

reviews.name: Jiesi Zhang
reviews.text:
I was so fortunate to have found Ron Parpara through a referral when I needed a realtors help. As my agent, he assisted me with everything! Even though difficult situations happened, he was patient, working very hard and solved problems right away. He always prioritizes the interests of his client.

The best part about working with Ron was that he was always more focused on helping me with my difficulties and giving me good advice. I would definitely recommend him to anyone. He is an amazing realtor!

reviews.name: Tyler Kolpin
reviews.text: I worked with Ron to get my first condo in Vancouver. He is extremely professional and went out of his way to help make the process as stress-free as possible given the hot market. Vancouver is a very competitive market and condos are selling tens of thousands over asking and Ron help me secure a great place below asking. He has been extremely helpful and knowledgeable in the process after completion, helping me navigate the new responsibilities as a first time homeowner. There seems to be quite a few shady realtors that we came across in the home buying process and Ron has the proper judgement and intellect to make sure you are fully protected.

reviews.name: Devin Su
reviews.text: Worked together on a deal. Straight forward, honest and friendly. Fantastic to work with.

reviews.name: Kevin Howell
reviews.text: Ron was professional and courteous while looking for an apartment for our daughter. When it was crunch time Ron kept our stress in check and came through for us. Thank you Ron for your diligence.

reviews.name: Ranjot Khakh
reviews.text:
Ron is the guy you need on your side when selling your Condo! His knowledge of Vancouver especially Yaletown is an amazing asset he has. He has this down to a science! Thank you for your help Ron

Ranjot.

reviews.name: Shannon M
reviews.text: Top agent in Vancouver. Sold my Yaletown condo seamlessly. Unprecedented service levels and NO dealing with any assistants, new agents or teams like majority of top agents. No surprises. 6 Stars! Can’t thank you enough!

reviews.name: Ed Karsai
reviews.text: I've found Ron to be professional and easy to work with. Recently we needed a market evaluation for a property. Ron put together a professional and comprehensive evaluation that helped us achieve our goals.

reviews.name: Meryl H
reviews.text: If there is anyone you want on your team, it’s Ron Parpara! He not only brings a wealth of knowledge  and experience when it comes to  real estate but his strategic marketing ensures that his clients gets the best possible price in a highly competitive market. Congratulations on setting record price for your sellers!

reviews.name: marsha ablowitz
reviews.text: Ron Parpara was my realtor when I sold my large home in Kerrisdale and when I bought my condo in the West End. Ron is personable and calm. He listened well to what I wanted and carefully negotiated good deals for me. He is a skilled problem solver and was very ethical looking out for my best interest.

reviews.name: Marcel Brichon
reviews.text: I was introduced to Ron as the realtor of a client I was helping with a mortgage.  Ron was thoughtful and courteous throughout, taking care that the client was protected from risks in a fast moving market.  I would not hesitate to recommend Ron for real estate needs

reviews.name: Arash D
reviews.text: Ron is a great realtor. Our experience in dealing with Ron has been fantastic. He is an honest and hardworking agent. Highly recommended!

reviews.name: Bryan Kawer
reviews.text: Anytime I have questions about real estate Ron is always genuinely happy to help. You can tell that it comes natural to him and he really knows his stuff. When it came time for us to purchase, I called Ron to discuss the process in great detail. He was happy to help and caution me about any potential red flags. Ron never once mentioned about compensation and we ended up purchasing this property directly from the owner (it was the property we were currently renting) bc we live in Penticton. Without a doubt, I would recommend Ron for all your real estate needs. If I ever move back to Vancouver, he will be my realtor of choice without any hesitation.

reviews.name: Thomas Arnold
reviews.text:
Ron delivered customer service beyond what I thought possible, and worked extremely hard helping my wife and I find a place.  He was patient with us as we were new home buyers and we took a few months to figure out and learn the market and what we wanted.

Ron always wanted to make sure the place we were getting would meet our needs while also being a smart purchase that for instance, wouldn’t end up being impossible to resell or have expensive repairs. I always felt that Ron put our interests first over an easy route out, and genuinely cared about helping us make a good decision on a place even if it took longer.

When we had an accepted offer, Ron kicked into an even higher gear.  During a sizzling hot spring market, he managed to negotiate the price down and fought for every extra dollar we could save on a great home for us.

Ron was excellent to work with and I would choose him as my realtor again in a heartbeat.

reviews.name: Jose M
reviews.text: Most underrated realtor in all of Vancouver. If you want to sell your home, look no further. You will never look back.

reviews.name: Jose Ilitzky
reviews.text:
We couldn't have done it without Ron.

It was time to move to a bigger space, so my wife and I set out on the journey of buying a townhouse and selling our apartment. We decided to do it in a short timeframe and working with Ron made all the difference!

To start, Ron set a personalized online search that displayed only properties relevant to our criteria. This saved us a tremendous amount of time and allowed us to quickly respond in a hot real estate market. When we eventually found the one, Ron expertly guided us in carefully writing the winning offer.

Then it was time to sell the apartment and this is where Ron's 10+ year experience as a realtor really shined through. He organized a professional team of painters, cleaner, stagers, and photographer that quickly made our apartment look its best! Over the course of one week including an open house weekend, Ron attracted over 80 potential buyers, out of which 15 wrote offers at or above asking price.

My wife and I are very thankful we chose Ron for the job. He went above and beyond, absolutely exceeding expectations.

reviews.name: Tiffany Li
reviews.text:
Ron was very helpful throughout our purchasing process. Different from other realtors we had been with before, he was very proactive in following up, scheduled many showings matching our criterias, and giving us his professional insights in each of the units we had seen (e.x. What this building is known for, what to check etc.)

I would recommend him to any of my family and friends.

reviews.name: Russ Serion
reviews.text: Ron was really helpful, professional and provided top notch service when I was looking for a place. In a tough market, he found me a dog friendly central place in downtown.

reviews.name: Home Ingredients
reviews.text: Home Ingredients is proud to say that we have been working closely with Ron to stage some of his properties for the last 6 years, we are now his go-to staging company. It is always a pleasure to work with Ron and his clients.

reviews.name: travis mulock
reviews.text: Ron has great knowledge of yaletown and has helped greatly. I had an excellent experience when dealing with him in my building at Pinnacle.

reviews.name: Christina Brzica
reviews.text: We have worked with Ron for just over a year now on some investment properties. He is very professional, responsive and flexible, willing to go above and beyond to make sure to answer all our questions and to guide us appropriately.

reviews.name: Joachim Blum
reviews.text: Mercedes has sent me on an international assignment from Germany to the Vancouver area, and I was fortunate to work with Ron to have him find a home for my family of five. I ended up getting a home in the Shaugnessy neighborhood. He negotiated a very good deal for a superb home. Not only did he go to great lenghts and many showings to find us the right home, but he was also very patient (as we had three small children accompany us through all of it), gave us valuable advice since we were not only unfamiliar with the local market, but also with Canada in general. Ron showed great talent to match the showings to the type of home we were looking for and advised us away from risky deals. Ron is very professional and hard working, available from early in the morning until late at night and through the weekends. reviews.text: I've worked with Ron for several years now and am impressed with his level of service and dedication to his clients. Ron's a realtor who cares and knows the business - buyers and sellers can't go wrong with a realtor as professional as Ron!

reviews.name: Dan Levinson
reviews.text: What I loved most about Ron's service is his utmost work ethics and incredible knowledge of Yaletown. Next time I'll be looking for a condo to buy (or to sell my current one for that matter), I'll go with Ron.

reviews.name: Jennifer Spiegel
reviews.text:
I recently had the good fortune of working with Ron Parpara once again. He used his experience and expertise to help me successfully sell my condo in Lower Lonsdale and purchase one at a preferred location in Pacific Point, Yaletown of approximately the same size and at a lower price. This turned out to be a very pleasant surprise because the prices in Yaletown are usually considerably higher than on the North Shore.

The task of selling my condo was a challenging one. In addition to major construction going on directly in front of my building and a dark kitchen, the market had been changing and really slowing down. Also, there were 6 other units that went up for sale in the same building complex, around the same time! Ron however, developed a marketing strategy which included professional staging, photos, repairs, advertising and open houses every weekend. We had many interested visitors and offers that soon followed. My unit was the first to sell out the 7 and with Ron’s help, negotiated a record breaking price which considering current market trends was impressive. Then, he helped me locate and negotiate a corner unit suite in Yaletown at a lower price!

Even though the contractors he recommended were hit and miss, I was overall satisfied with his service.

reviews.name: Ting Yu
reviews.text: Great realtor, best experience ever!

title: Gaëtan Kill - Vancouver Realtor with Engel & Völkers

reviews.name: F Gue
reviews.text: Gaëtan is the kindest, most honest and dedicated realtor in Vancouver. He knows the downtown market better than anyone else, taking you to exactly what you are looking for. He makes real estate fun because he is passionate about what he does. He is a true professional in every sense of the word. But he is also *so* caring. He doesn't miss any detail and is always there to help, even after a purchase. We wouldn't hesitate to recommend him to anyone looking to buy their first home or make their first investment. Or if you are that someone who wants to take advantage of something 'hot' on the market, Gaëtan will show it to you. And you'll never look back.

reviews.name: Sampson Low Real Estate
reviews.text: Working with Gaetan was delightful and straight forward. He is very hardworking and is one of the most professional agents I have ever worked with!

reviews.name: Mia Park
reviews.text: Gaëtan is amazing! He really knows the real estate market and how to get the best results for his clients. So yes, I definitely recommend Gaëtan to all my family and friends for all their real estate needs. Thank you so much!

reviews.text: We moved recently from Toronto and were looking for a new real estate agent in Vancouver. Gaetan had great reviews and we decided to meet him to guide us through a purchase of a new home. As soon as we met him, we knew he was the right fit for us. He was professional, always responsive, attentive and hard working. Once it was time to put an offer in, he guided us step by step through process of buying a new home in a new city. He explained everything in detail and we were confident in our purchase. We would wholeheartedly recommend Gaetan for all your real estate needs.

reviews.name: Sarah Ren
reviews.text: Gaetan went above and beyond the call of duty to make sure that my needs were understood and taken care of. He was professional, reliable, and very friendly. He definitely over delivered on his promise. I would recommend him to anyone looking to buy/sell real estate. Thanks Gaetan!

reviews.text: Gaetan is a true professional and helped us find a place, through the entire process he was available, supportive, and diligent in negotiating  several offers. He acted quickly in a no-pressure manner which we greatly appreciated during this somewhat stressful time. We would highly recommend him.

reviews.name: Vincent M
reviews.text: Great experience working with Gaëtan! As first time buyers with my partner, real estate market can be tricky. Gaëtan was very professional and very patient with us. Lots of excellent advices from him. We learned a lot. Thanks to his recommendations we always took the good decisions. He is always available and extremely friendly. He truly understood us and our needs. We trusted him every step of the way. We also introduced him to our close friends. Highly recommended!

reviews.name: Paul Weidman
reviews.text: I fully endorse Mr. Gaëtan Kill and his team at Engel & Völkers Realtors for their real estate services in Vancouver. Gaëtan is an absolute pleasure to work with! He loves his job and is great at it – a true professional. Gaëtan is very knowledgeable about the real estate market and process; I learned a lot from him when selling our home. Gaëtan is a very clear and articulate communicator with his clients and with other agents and potential buyers. Gaëtan and his team did an excellent job of marketing our condo and made sure we got the maximum value for our home. He also made sure that the whole process went very smoothly. Bravo Gaëtan!

reviews.name: Elo B
reviews.text: Gaëtan was our real estate agent when we sold our home and we would recommend him to anyone in the Vancouver area looking to buy or sell a house. He is very experienced in marketing and was creative with getting our home maximum exposure.  He came to our house and conducted an extensive on site evaluation. Within a few days he had produced an extensive market analysis showing us the comparable houses and prices in our area. He recommended the best price to sell for a timely sale. Throughout the selling process Gaëtan was an invaluable resource for us every step of the way. He recommended various trade people to help us in cleaning out, painting, repairing, floor work, and staging to make our home look its best. He was always there to answer our questions and help us to get our property sold. He also performed an extensive marketing campaign to show our home to the widest audience. In addition to being an excellent realtor, Gaëtan is also a great guy and a pleasure to work with. I cannot recommend him highly enough.

reviews.name: Kaye Chen
reviews.text: Gaëtan is a very trustworthy and detail oriented realtor, he is very responsible for his job. You can entrust him with most of the things of buying and selling your place. He will do all the preparations before putting the place in the market. He will even come to help to do the house cleaning and decoration before taking the pictures and video ( only when it does not meet his standard), to make sure everything looks nice and organized. He sold my condo within 2 weeks and higher then listing price, I didn’t expect of that. Thank you so much !!

reviews.name: Greg Lee
reviews.text: Gaëtan is the BEST Vancouver realtor we have had the pleasure of working with! We know he is quite busy and has many clients, but he always made himself available for our schedule. He was patient, mostly with us trying to figure out what we wanted...but at the end of it all, he helped us make that decision, and we found our perfect place quite quickly. He also has a very good idea of the real estate market and provided us with excellent advice when it came to making offers. Gaëtan definitely looks out for the better interest of his clients and we felt extremely comfortable working with him. We would definitely work with him again and recommend him to anyone buying or selling a home! Great job, Gaëtan!

reviews.name: Ken Tam
reviews.text: Gaetan is an extremely hard worker and went over and above to satisfy my requirements when selling my home.  He is a very honest person that I can trust.  I will be reaching out to him again for my next real estate sale or purchase.

reviews.name: Hong Yen Nguyen Thi
reviews.text: Gaëtan is very experienced. He is the most professional and committed Realtor I have ever had the pleasure of working with. I have no hesitation in recommending him, he is the best at what he does. I am very happy with my home purchase.

reviews.name: Warren van Zyl
reviews.text: We first used Gaetan when selling our condo. Since then we have had close family and friends that have used him and would all agree. Not including his expertise and experience he is a driven, focused and talented agent. I would highly recommend his services to anyone.

reviews.text: Gaetan is a realtor who cares and delivers. I met him 8 years ago and he  helped me purchase an investment property. Fast forward to 2019, the market has slowed considerably, but thanks to Gaetan's outstanding knowledge of the business, his creative sales strategies and his relentless efforts, we were able to sell two properties within one short month! We couldn't have done it without him and his business partner Brittany White. Thank you, Gaetan, for all your hard work.

reviews.text: Gaetan is a very patient and focused realtor, he understands condo buildings downtown extremely well and can take the mystery out of purchasing into these large buildings. He looks out for his customer's best interests and has great people skills.

reviews.text: Hardworking, honest and professional real estate agent.  Could not ask for a better realtor.  Highly recommended.
