reviews.text: Gaëtan is a great realtor that knows Vancouver and the surrounding communities very well.  He is genuine and will work hard for you. You won’t feel rushed, or pressured, he just wants you to be truly happy with the home you choose. If you are looking for a true professional in the real estate field, look no further!

reviews.name: Gery Valtiner
reviews.text:
I could not have had a more pleasant experience, selling my condo with Gaetan and Jamie from Engel & Voelkers.  Right from the start, all clicked and the guidelines and advise they gave me, was great! From picking the right "number" in regards to the selling rate, to how to set up the place so it shows well to producing a professional folder for the listing ( with a professional photographer, a mini video etc ).  Since they are extremely professional and personable, they apparently also attract the right clients and after the first 2 showings, we had 2 offers and it was all over !!!    3 days on the market.   After it was all settled, the followed up, made sure that the bureaucratic stuff was all done efficiently.
I could not have had a better team than Gaetan and Jamie, looking after the sale of the condo.  THANKS AGAIN and needless to say that I will contact Gatean and Jamie for any real estate transaction I will do.

reviews.name: Saeedeh Ghazvinian
reviews.text:
My husband & I owened a one-bedroom apartment in downtown Vancouver that we wanted to sell it out and buy a two-bedroom condo in the same area.

I found Gaetan online and while I was reading his reviews I found out I wanted to work with him. I called him the same day. In first appointment we were so amazed with his knowledge about Vancouver housing market and he gave us very helpful advise.

We were so picky about our next condo and it took us around 5 months to find our perfect place in Coal harbour area. During this time he was always patient and available to answer all our questions .When a good listing came to market he sent us email immediately and made the first available appointment to show it to us. he was always looking out our best interest and he kept us away from wrong building or wrong deals.

about selling our own place, he hired a professional photographer to take the best possible photos  and videos and shared them on all social medias including Facebook , Instagram and you-tube .. to make sure he could show it to as many people as he could. He sold our condo in less than a week.

Beside all of that, It was a such a pleasure to work with Gaetan. We will recommand him to all our friends and family looking for a realor and if we want to buy or sell a property in Vancouver , Gaetan will be our first call.

Thanks Gaetan
From a grateful client

reviews.name: Justin Sheridan
reviews.text:
In my dealings over the years with a number of realtors bother in Canada and oversea, none has come close to Gaetan. He is exceedingly professional in everything he does, thorough, diligent, courteous and he always, always had my interests at the forefront. At no stage did I feel he wanted me to close a deal to satisfy his needs and he wanted me to be happy with my purchase.

When it came time to actually negotiating a purchase, he advised me very well as to the value of the property and did the research required to make a successful offer whilst not getting caught up in the frenzy that is the current market. I ended up with a house which I am extremely happy with and within my budget and I will recommend Gaetan to anybody who is looking to either buy or sell a home, without question

reviews.name: GV Lifestyle
reviews.text:
My husband and I started looking for our first condo in Vancouver. I found Gaetan online. It was the best choice to have him as our Realtor. He always responds quickly even on the weekends and sets up showings as soon as possible. He comes for the showing well prepared. He asks what we like and we don't like about the actual condo. He listens and makes sure that the next condo meets the criteria. He is always honest about the asking price and looks for other condos in the building to see how much they sold for in the past. If we ever want to upgrade we just have to e-mail Gaetan and the rest will be taken care of.
Thank you for all the hard work and your time that you spent understanding on our needs.

Best regards,

Gabi and Marton

reviews.name: teresa guo
reviews.text: Gaeton is an excellent real estate agent. It took us roughly 6~7 months to find an apartment but his enthusiasm and hard working spirit never seemed to decline. We looked at many apartments and although there were many miss matches it never once felt that he was trying to push me towards a sale. He show cased an extreme objectivity to my every request and was kind enough to give me the utmost honest opinion he could. All-in-all, while there is an ever growing abundance of real estate agents, it can be fair to assume that poaching prospective clientele may be at a real estate agents top priority. However, Gaeton never once fell short as a true to heart salesman and he never once put his interests above mine. In my opinion, the only shortcoming of my experience was that I was never notified that some real estate agents refund a portion of their commission back to their clients. Despite this, I would highly recommend Gaeton for he has exceptional customer service and a keen eye for what's hot on the market.

reviews.name: Brian Sarling
reviews.text: Gaetan is professional, organized, knowledgable with an extensive handle on the market. He was an absolute asset to our purchase and we couldn't be more grateful.

reviews.name: Keira Yang
reviews.text:
Gaetan, first of all, is a very good listener. He will try his best to know you and help you find your home. At the same time, he is not afraid of giving his opinion and sharing his understanding about Vancouver real estate market.

I am a first time buyer. Thanks Gaetan for giving me enough space and time to make a dicision. He is very supportive.

reviews.name: Steve Johnson
reviews.text:
In our search for and ultimately the purchase of a penthouse condo in the Coal Harbor area of Vancouver Gaetan Kill's efforts as our realtor were outstanding. Gaetan initially spent time understanding our needs and priorities. Gaetan  did a very thorough job in investigating available properties and keeping us fully informed as new properties emerged on the market. The facts that we were out of town buyers from the US  and that the realestate market in Vancouver is  highly competitive and fast moving added to the complexity of the search. Gaetan performed admirably. We had full faith Gaetan would find us an optimal property which he did. Once we selected the property he guided us through the negotiation, inspection and closing process in a very professional manner. My wife and I highly recommend Gaetan as a realtor and a valued advisor in the realestate  area. We were extremely happy with Gaetan and the process we went through and the end result.
Gaetan "Kill"ed it.

reviews.name: Suniti Pande
reviews.text: I highly recommend Gaetan as a Buyers agent in a Tough Sellers market.  I met Gaetan outside a condo he was showing me, and the listing agent was a no-show. Gaetan apologized profusely on his behalf and offered me a drink for my time wasted. This kindness and courtesy made my decision to hire him as my agent. He showed me condo after condo, no pressure. I learned a lot about buildings, depreciation reports, strata docs, making competitive offers based on real value, never selling me out for a quick sale, steering me away from a bad building even when I felt that was a good condo and changed my mind after I saw the awful depreciation report. Good call Gaetan! He knew about recent sales, reputations of buildings, their managements etc. I really felt like he was a family member looking after my interests. He was patient, addressed every doubt, accepted change of mind, and restarted looking again, without the slightest fatigue, right through to conveyancing and possession. THANK YOU Gaetan!

reviews.name: Caroline Lee
reviews.text:
A pleasant and patient man. Gaetan will spend days, months and yes, even years by your side until you find the perfect nest. When you choose to embark on your search for the perfect Vancouver condo with Gaetan, you also choose to be pampered by your real estate agent. When you visit an area or listing for the very first time with Gaetan, you can trust that you are in the company of a friend. We all know as well as the next buyer that trust is crucial and unfortunately, rare. Gaetan offers this rarity with grace and ensures that you have his undivided attention at every encounter.

Seldom do I indulge in a hearty review; but if anyone deserves praise, Gaetan sure does. As such, I leave you, Reader, with my most sincere and firm endorsement of Gaetan Kill, Vancouver Real Estate Agent.

reviews.name: Alzbeta Markova
reviews.text:
As we were looking to buy our first condo in Yaletown, we spent over three months searching independently before we finally decided to find a real estate agent. We had placed a bid on a home and were outbid once before we realized that we might not actually understand the Vancouver real estate process as much as we thought we did. When we started looking for a realtor, we did not think we were going to find someone who could legitimately help us. We were really just looking for someone to act as a middle man, as we were tired of looking on our own. When we started working with Gaetan, we realized we were going to get far more than that.

First of all, he was always ready to take our calls and would always respond to emails in a prompt manner. Whenever we would try to get in touch with him, he would either answer immediately or call us back as soon as possible—but he also never answered a call while he was with us, which we really appreciated.

Second, he helped us evaluating what we wanted and what we needed so he could only show us condos that were actually viable options. Gaetan sent us emails with all the 2 bedroom condos for sell in Yaletown that were in our price range. He scheduled showings and guided us through the neighbourhood, he was very knowledgeable and familiar with most of the buildings we looked at. We received full information for each condo and he always provided us with all recent sales in each buildings.

He never influenced our decision until we asked him to do so. That was another reason we felt comfortable working with him, Gaetan was very patient, he was calm, even during the buying process. He made an effort to get to know us personally, and really acted more like a friend with real estate knowledge than like a buying real estate agent.

If you are looking for a realtor, Gaetan should be at the top of your list. He works hard for his clients and in the end helped us purchase the perfect condo.

reviews.name: Jas Dosanjh
reviews.text:
To Gaetan,

We would like to formally say thank you very much for your professional attention to the sale of our home, 5260 Sherbrooke Street, Vancouver BC.

We were very satisfied with the marketing of our home and the selling process.

Gaetan took all our worries away and  made the selling process stress free through his  professionalism and keeping us informed of potenial buyer's feedback and comments.

We highly recommend Gaetan to prospective sellers and wish him the very best for the future.

Warmets Regards,

Jas Dosanjh, Baby Rayne Dosanjh & Marleen Randhawa.
